translated: In the north is Zombie, bestowing empowerment with a white vase of elixir.🔽In the southeast is Stainer, holding a branch in her hand, dancing in the charnel ground.🔽In the southwest is Fierce, holding a flag in her hand, standing on a wind mandala.

original: nub byang du sme ba lag na me thab 'bar ba thogs pa g-yas brkyang bas gnas pa'o ;
analyzed: nub byang du sme ba lag na me thab 'bar ba thogs pa g-yas brkyang bas gnas pa'o ;
translated: In the northwest is Blemish, holding a blazing hearth in her hand, standing with her right leg extended.

original: / thal ba rab tu 'jig pa la sogs pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du bshad pa las 'dir yang de rnams shin tu 'dug pa'i gnas pas de rnams nyid kyi gnas gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: / thal ba rab tu 'jig pa la sogs pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du bshad pa las 'dir yang de rnams shin tu 'dug pa'i gnas pas de rnams nyid kyi gnas gzhag par bya'o //
translated: The “ashes, total destruction, and so on” are explained in the Vajrasattva maṇḍala, and here they should be placed in their own places with the extremely firm placement.

original: padma'i dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor la yang sna tshogs pa dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang dkar po dang / sngon po dang / ser po dang / le brgan gyi padma la padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa yang phyag gi rtse mor thogs nas lag pa brkyang ste 'khor lor byas pas gar mdzad pa /
analyzed: padma'i dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor la yang sna tshogs pa dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang dkar po dang / sngon po dang / ser po dang / le brgan gyi padma la padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa yang phyag gi rtse mor thogs nas lag pa brkyang ste 'khor lor byas pas gar mdzad pa /
translated: In the maṇḍala of Padmanātha, one should draw a vajra marked with a lotus and so on, held in the tips of the hands, with various colors—red, green, white, blue, yellow, and magenta—on lotuses, and with the dance gesture of extending the hands.

original: g-yon dkur brten pas sna tshogs padma 'dzin pa /🔽phyag g-yas pas snying gar kha 'byed pa shel gyi mdog can 'bar ba sna tshogs pa /
analyzed: g-yon dkur brten pas sna tshogs padma 'dzin pa / phyag g-yas pas snying gar kha 'byed pa shel gyi mdog can 'bar ba sna tshogs pa /
translated: One should draw a variegated lotus held to the left hip.🔽With the right hand, one should draw a crystal-colored lotus with a variegated flame opening at the heart.

original: 'khrug pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can du dgod do //
analyzed: 'khrug pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can du dgod do //
translated: One should draw a variegated lotus held to the left hip.

original: sgrub pa po yang g-yon dkur brten pas padma 'dzin pa la /
analyzed: sgrub pa po yang g-yon dkur brten pas padma 'dzin pa la /
translated: The practitioner should also draw a variegated lotus held to the left hip.

original: g-yas kyis snying gar 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas kyis snying gar 'byed pa'o //
translated: The right hand is in the heart, in the gesture of opening.

original: lhag ma rnams ni ji ltar mos pa bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni ji ltar mos pa bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The rest are as one wishes.

original: lho phyogs kyi re'u cha la rnam par gzigs ma /
analyzed: lho phyogs kyi re'u cha la rnam par gzigs ma /
translated: In the southern square, one should draw Vairocanī,

original: padma dmar po kha dbye ba bskor ba'i tshul gyis 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: padma dmar po kha dbye ba bskor ba'i tshul gyis 'dzin pa'o //
translated: holding an open red lotus.

original: lho phyogs kyi re'u cha la sgrol ma lag pa g-yon pas padma ljang gu 'dzin cing /
analyzed: lho phyogs kyi re'u cha la sgrol ma lag pa g-yon pas padma ljang gu 'dzin cing /
translated: In the southern square, one should draw Tārā, holding a green lotus with the left hand,

original: lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur snying gar bstod nas 'jog pa'o //
analyzed: lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur snying gar bstod nas 'jog pa'o //
translated: and placing the right hand in the gesture of menace at the heart.

original: nub phyogs kyi re'u cha la rgyan can ma g-yon gyis padma dkar po 'dzin pa /
analyzed: nub phyogs kyi re'u cha la rgyan can ma g-yon gyis padma dkar po 'dzin pa /
translated: In the western square, one should draw Alaṃboḍhi, holding a white lotus with the left hand,

original: lag pa g-yas kyis 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bstod de 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: lag pa g-yas kyis 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bstod de 'dzin pa'o //
translated: and holding a wheel with eight spokes with the right hand in the gesture of menace.🔽In the northern square, one should draw Bhṛkuṭī, holding a blue lotus with the left hand,

original: byang gi re'u cha la khro gnyer ma g-yon na autpala sngon po 'dzin pa g-yas na ba dan gsum pas gar byed cing mdung thogs pa'o //
analyzed: byang gi re'u cha la khro gnyer ma g-yon na autpala sngon po 'dzin pa g-yas na ba dan gsum pas gar byed cing mdung thogs pa'o //
translated: and dancing with the right hand holding a banner and a spear.

original: shar lho'i re'u cha la padmo gnas ma g-yon na padma dkar po 'dzin pa /
analyzed: shar lho'i re'u cha la padmo gnas ma g-yon na padma dkar po 'dzin pa /
translated: In the southeastern square, one should draw Padmodbhavā, holding a white lotus with the left hand,🔽and holding a wheel with eight spokes with the right hand in the gesture of menace.

original: g-yas kyis gar byed pa'i tshul gyis chu srin gyi rgya mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas kyis gar byed pa'i tshul gyis chu srin gyi rgya mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
translated: With the right, she holds a makara banner in the manner of dancing.

original: lho nub kyi re'u cha la rdo rje padma'i dbang phyug ma g-yon na padma le brgan thogs pa /
analyzed: lho nub kyi re'u cha la rdo rje padma'i dbang phyug ma g-yon na padma le brgan thogs pa /
translated: In the southwest square, Vajrapadma-īśvarī holds a red lotus in the left hand.

original: g-yas na snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bstod nas 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas na snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bstod nas 'dzin pa'o //
translated: With the right, she holds a five-pronged vajra at the heart, holding it in the manner of praise.

original: @76a * // nub byang du padma gtum ma'i dbang phyug ma ni g-yon 'gying bas padma 'dzin pa /
analyzed: @76a * // nub byang du padma gtum ma'i dbang phyug ma ni g-yon 'gying bas padma 'dzin pa /
translated: In the northwest, Padmatunda-īśvarī holds a lotus with a left hand in a swaying manner.

original: g-yas kyis rtse gsum gar byed pas 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas kyis rtse gsum gar byed pas 'dzin pa'o //
translated: With the right, she holds a trident in the manner of dancing.

original: byang shar du sna tshogs padma g-yon 'gying bas sna tshogs padma 'dzin pa /
analyzed: byang shar du sna tshogs padma g-yon 'gying bas sna tshogs padma 'dzin pa /
translated: In the northeast, Citra-padma holds a multicolored lotus with a left hand in a swaying manner.

original: g-yas kyis 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'dzin pa'o ;
analyzed: g-yas kyis 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'dzin pa'o ;
translated: With the right, she holds an eight-spoked wheel.

original: / de dag thams cad kyang g-yon pa 'gying bag dang bcas pas rang gi padma ji lta ba bzhin du 'dzin par bya'o //
analyzed: / de dag thams cad kyang g-yon pa 'gying bag dang bcas pas rang gi padma ji lta ba bzhin du 'dzin par bya'o //
translated: All of them hold their own lotuses with left hands in a swaying manner.

original: lhag ma ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du bshad pa las 'dir phyag mtshan padmas mtshan pas gzhag par bya'o //🔽rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du yang dbus su bcom ldan 'das sku mdog dmar po la g-yon na gzhu 'dzin /
analyzed: lhag ma ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du bshad pa las 'dir phyag mtshan padmas mtshan pas gzhag par bya'o // rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du yang dbus su bcom ldan 'das sku mdog dmar po la g-yon na gzhu 'dzin /
translated: The rest are to be placed here with the insignia marked by lotuses, as explained in the Vajrasattva maṇḍala.

original: g-yas na mda' gsor ba /🔽yang g-yon na dkyil 'khor /
analyzed: g-yas na mda' gsor ba / yang g-yon na dkyil 'khor /
translated: In the maṇḍala of the Vajra Sun, in the center, the Bhagavān is red in color, holding a bow in the left [hand] and drawing a arrow with the right.🔽Again, in the left [hand] he holds a maṇḍala,

original: g-yas na ral gri bsnams par dgod do //
analyzed: g-yas na ral gri bsnams par dgod do //
translated: and in the right a sword.

original: sgrub pa po yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor thogs pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa po yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor thogs pa'o //
translated: The adept also holds a sun maṇḍala.

original: lhag ma rnams kyang ji ltar mos pa bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams kyang ji ltar mos pa bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The rest are to be accomplished according to one’s devotion.

original: shar la sogs pa re'u cha rnams la dbang bskur ma la sogs pa rin po che'i cod pan dang / gter gyi bum pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / me tog la sogs pas bkang ba'i mchod pa'i snod rnams lag na thogs pa'o //
analyzed: shar la sogs pa re'u cha rnams la dbang bskur ma la sogs pa rin po che'i cod pan dang / gter gyi bum pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / me tog la sogs pas bkang ba'i mchod pa'i snod rnams lag na thogs pa'o //
translated: In the squares beginning with the east, Abhisikhā and so forth hold jeweled crowns, treasure vases, victory banners, and offering vessels filled with flowers and so forth in their hands.

original: shar lho la sogs pa'i mtshams kyi re'u cha rnams su yang phyag mtshan de dag nyid do //
analyzed: shar lho la sogs pa'i mtshams kyi re'u cha rnams su yang phyag mtshan de dag nyid do //
translated: The hand emblems are also in the squares of the southeast and so forth.

original: lhag ma ni de dag sngar bshad pa las 'dir rin po ches mtshan pa phyag mtshan 'dzin par bya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni de dag sngar bshad pa las 'dir rin po ches mtshan pa phyag mtshan 'dzin par bya'o //
translated: The rest is as explained above, except that here one should hold the hand emblems marked with the jewels.

original: de dag nyid dang dkyil 'khor gzhan dag gi dbus su ni dpal rta mchog gi sku phyag bzhi pa zhabs bzhi pa ste /
analyzed: de dag nyid dang dkyil 'khor gzhan dag gi dbus su ni dpal rta mchog gi sku phyag bzhi pa zhabs bzhi pa ste /
translated: In the center of those and other mandalas, one should place the glorious Hayagriva, with four arms and four legs.

original: de yang g-yon gyi khu tshur gyi sa sna tshogs padma 'dzin pa /
analyzed: de yang g-yon gyi khu tshur gyi sa sna tshogs padma 'dzin pa /
translated: He holds a multicolored lotus with his left fist,

original: g-yas kyi ba ngan gsum pa'i tshul gyis sna tshogs rdo rje bteg nas 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas kyi ba ngan gsum pa'i tshul gyis sna tshogs rdo rje bteg nas 'dzin pa'o //
translated: and he holds aloft a multicolored vajra with his right fist in the manner of the third vow.

original: yang gnyis kyis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan dag las ci 'dod pa thogs par dgod par bya'o ;
analyzed: yang gnyis kyis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan dag las ci 'dod pa thogs par dgod par bya'o ;
translated: One should also place whatever one desires from the hand emblems of Vajrasattva and so forth.

original: / sgrub pa po yang sna tshogs rdo rje thogs par bya'o //
analyzed: / sgrub pa po yang sna tshogs rdo rje thogs par bya'o //
translated: The practitioner should also hold a multicolored vajra.

original: lhag ma rnams ni ji ltar mos pa bzhin bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni ji ltar mos pa bzhin bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The rest should be accomplished as one wishes.

original: de dag ni rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: de dag ni rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan pa'o //
translated: They are marked with their own seals.

original: des skal ba bzang po dang ldan pas skal ba bzang ngo //
analyzed: des skal ba bzang po dang ldan pas skal ba bzang ngo //
translated: Since he is endowed with good fortune, he is fortunate.

original: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni mdza' ba'i @76b 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni mdza' ba'i @76b 'dus pa'o //
translated: The assembly circle is the gathering of friends.

original: brtag par bya ba ni bskyed par bya ba'o //
analyzed: brtag par bya ba ni bskyed par bya ba'o //
translated: What is to be imagined is what is to be generated.

original: grub pa zhes bya ba ni sngags kyis drangs pa'o //
analyzed: grub pa zhes bya ba ni sngags kyis drangs pa'o //
translated: Accomplishment is the invocation by means of mantra.

original: yi ge h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje'i rnam pa'i cha shas kyi rang bzhin gyi chu'o //
analyzed: yi ge h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje'i rnam pa'i cha shas kyi rang bzhin gyi chu'o //
translated: The water that has the nature of the parts of the form of a vajra arisen from the syllable hūṃ.

original: de yang rdo rje dang bcas pa ni rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa'o //
analyzed: de yang rdo rje dang bcas pa ni rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa'o //
translated: Moreover, together with the vajra is the vajra consecration.

original: mtshal chen po ni khrag chen po'o //
analyzed: mtshal chen po ni khrag chen po'o //
translated: Great vermilion is great blood.

original: bsgrubs pa ni sngags kyis ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par bsngags te zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: bsgrubs pa ni sngags kyis ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par bsngags te zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: Accomplishment is as previously stated, up to “having enchanted with the mantra as it is.”

original: mthu yis zhes pa ni che ba'i bdag nyid du grub pa'o //
analyzed: mthu yis zhes pa ni che ba'i bdag nyid du grub pa'o //
translated: By power is the accomplishment of greatness.

original: rab tu bsgrub pa ni snga ma bas kyang mchog tu gyur pa ste /
analyzed: rab tu bsgrub pa ni snga ma bas kyang mchog tu gyur pa ste /
translated: Supreme accomplishment is even more excellent than the previous.

original: stobs dang ldan pas ni dang po blang ngo //
analyzed: stobs dang ldan pas ni dang po blang ngo //
translated: By the powerful one is the first one to be taken.

original: stobs med pas ni gzhan dag go padma'i snod ces bya ba ni thod pa'o //
analyzed: stobs med pas ni gzhan dag go padma'i snod ces bya ba ni thod pa'o //
translated: The vessel of lotus is a skull-cup.

original: de nyid rab tu grub pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir chags pa chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid rab tu grub pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir chags pa chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach just that, he says, great passion, etc.

original: rdo rje thugs zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: rdo rje thugs zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: The vajra mind is the intuition of voidness.

original: de ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes ngo bo nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa rdo rje sems dpa'i ste /
analyzed: de ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes ngo bo nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa rdo rje sems dpa'i ste /
translated: That is the natural outflow of the intuition of voidness, the Vajrasattva.

original: de'i khu ba rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo ni khrag go //
analyzed: de'i khu ba rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo ni khrag go //
translated: His semen is the essence of Vajrasattva, which is blood.

original: de bas de'i sngags la sogs pas mngon par 'dus byas par gyur pa ni /
analyzed: de bas de'i sngags la sogs pas mngon par 'dus byas par gyur pa ni /
translated: Therefore, it is consecrated by his mantra, etc.

original: mtshal chen po ni sgrub pa dag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: mtshal chen po ni sgrub pa dag ces bya ba'am /
translated: The great lac is the accomplishment.

original: gang 'di sngags kyi yi ger byas la nang du bstim pa sngon du song bas shes rab dang thabs las byung ba ji lta bar nges bar 'byin pa 'di ni mtshal chen po nyid du bsgrubs pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di sngags kyi yi ger byas la nang du bstim pa sngon du song bas shes rab dang thabs las byung ba ji lta bar nges bar 'byin pa 'di ni mtshal chen po nyid du bsgrubs pa'o //
translated: Or, it is the great lac which is accomplished by the extraction of the essence of the mantra syllables, which are previously dissolved internally, just as they arise from wisdom and means.

original: de nyid rim pa snga mas mngon par 'dus byas pa /
analyzed: de nyid rim pa snga mas mngon par 'dus byas pa /
translated: That very [nectar] is prepared by the previous stage.

original: rdo rje mchu yis zhes bya ba dmar chen po ga pur dang tsandan dang bcas par sbyar la gang gi tshe /
analyzed: rdo rje mchu yis zhes bya ba dmar chen po ga pur dang tsandan dang bcas par sbyar la gang gi tshe /
translated: With the vajra beak means that one should mix together the great red [substance] with camphor and sandalwood.

original: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du bzhag pa de'i tshe ni ra sa yan kun slong ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du bzhag pa de'i tshe ni ra sa yan kun slong ba zhes bya'o //
translated: When it is placed in the maṇḍala of the assembly, at that time it is called the offering of the rasa.

original: zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin zhes bya ba ni ji ltar zhi ba'i sbyor ba rnams gyis lan gsum du byas la myong bar byed pa de bzhin du'o //
analyzed: zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin zhes bya ba ni ji ltar zhi ba'i sbyor ba rnams gyis lan gsum du byas la myong bar byed pa de bzhin du'o //
translated: As for like the drink of peace, just as those who are engaged in peace drink it three times, so [should one drink this].

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi //
translated: The bliss of the rasa, which is the nature of all buddhas,

original: ra sa ya'i bde ba zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ra sa ya na'i bde bas so //
analyzed: ra sa ya'i bde ba zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ra sa ya na'i bde bas so //
translated: is the bliss of the rasa that is the nature of Vajrasattva.

original: 'dis zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa ste'o //
analyzed: 'dis zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa ste'o //
translated: This refers to what was just explained.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe la sogs pa ni lha mo bzhi'i bdag nyid kyi dngos grub po //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe la sogs pa ni lha mo bzhi'i bdag nyid kyi dngos grub po //
translated: The attainment of the nature of the four goddesses is the life-empowerment of Vajrasattva, and so forth.

original: 'dus pa ni dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: 'dus pa ni dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The assembly is the maṇḍala.

original: der sbyor bas zhugs pa ni /
analyzed: der sbyor bas zhugs pa ni /
translated: Engaging there is entering.

original: 'dus pa der ni zhugs pa dag / ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'dus pa der ni zhugs pa dag / ces bya'o //
translated: means the one who has entered the mandala.🔽The circle of the assembly is the mandala.

analyzed: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya // zhes gsungs @77a * //
translated: The examination is the examination of the mandala.🔽The circle of the assembly is the mandala.

analyzed: pa de bstan par bya ba'i phyir / de nas khrus byas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The examination is the examination of the mandala.🔽The circle of the assembly is the mandala.

original: slong bar zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: slong bar zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The examination is the examination of the mandala.🔽The circle of the assembly is the mandala.

original: stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor yod med mthus //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i glu yis so //
analyzed: stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor yod med mthus // zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i glu yis so //
translated: The examination is the examination of the mandala.🔽The circle of the assembly is the mandala.

original: dal gyis su zhes bya ba ni rim gyis so //
analyzed: dal gyis su zhes bya ba ni rim gyis so //
translated: The examination is the examination of the mandala.

analyzed: gos dgab pa yi sbyor ba yis //
translated: The circle of the assembly is the mandala.

translated: The examination is the examination of the mandala.🔽The circle of the assembly is the mandala.🔽The examination is the examination of the mandala.🔽The circle of the assembly is the mandala.🔽The examination is the examination of the mandala.🔽The circle of the assembly is the mandala.

original: rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge h'um dgod la /
analyzed: rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge h'um dgod la /
translated: The examination is the examination of the mandala

original: stong pa nyid du rnal 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i glus bskul nas /
analyzed: stong pa nyid du rnal 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i glus bskul nas /
translated: Having been urged by the song “The yoga of emptiness” and so forth,

original: bdag nyid nam mkha' dang 'dra bar bltas la /
analyzed: bdag nyid nam mkha' dang 'dra bar bltas la /
translated: one should view oneself as like space.

original: de nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra bar byas nas /
analyzed: de nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra bar byas nas /
translated: Having made that into a moon mandala,

original: snying po brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas rdo rje sems dpa'i nga rgyal gyis rdo rje sems dpar gyur nas ma h'a sa ma ya satva ham zhes brjod /
analyzed: snying po brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas rdo rje sems dpa'i nga rgyal gyis rdo rje sems dpar gyur nas ma h'a sa ma ya satva ham zhes brjod /
translated: one should recite the essence mantra, and with the pride of Vajrasattva, having become Vajrasattva, one should recite “mahāsattva ham.”

original: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas kyang sa ma yo ham //
analyzed: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas kyang sa ma yo ham //
translated: Also, with one’s pledge seal, one should recite “samayo ’ham.”🔽Having blessed that with the essence mantra “samaya sattva adhiṣṭhānamam,”

original: zhes brjod de /🔽de nyid la sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha m'am /🔽zhes bya ba'i snying po la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs la /
analyzed: zhes brjod de / de nyid la sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha m'am / zhes bya ba'i snying po la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs la /
translated: and so forth,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rang gi glu dang gar sngon du 'gro bas phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya ba 'di ni bdag 'byung ba rnam pa gcig go //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rang gi glu dang gar sngon du 'gro bas phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya ba 'di ni bdag 'byung ba rnam pa gcig go //
translated: one should bind the great seal with the song and dance of oneself, beginning with “Vajrasattva bliss,” and so forth. This is the one type of self-generation.

original: yang dkyil 'khor du bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i lcags kyu yi ge h'um dang ldan pas spyan drangs la /
analyzed: yang dkyil 'khor du bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i lcags kyu yi ge h'um dang ldan pas spyan drangs la /
translated: Again, one should invite the Bhagavat into the mandala with the secret hook, endowed with the syllable hūṃ.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dbang bskur ba byas la gsang ba'i mchod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i de kho na nyid la sogs pa byas pa'i rdo rje bzung ba byas nas nam mkha' la 'dug ste /
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dbang bskur ba byas la gsang ba'i mchod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i de kho na nyid la sogs pa byas pa'i rdo rje bzung ba byas nas nam mkha' la 'dug ste /
translated: Having performed the consecration and the conferral of initiation just as before, and having performed the secret offering and so forth, one should hold the vajra, standing in space.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad stong pa nyid du byas la /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad stong pa nyid du byas la /
translated: One should make all world systems empty,

original: 'og tu yi ge h'um las rdo rjer bsams la /
analyzed: 'og tu yi ge h'um las rdo rjer bsams la /
translated: and below, one should imagine the syllable hūṃ as a vajra.

original: de las nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas klas pa'i rdo rje byung la /
analyzed: de las nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas klas pa'i rdo rje byung la /
translated: From that, a vajra arises to the ends of the realm of space.

original: de yongs su rdzogs pa las yang sna tshogs pa rnam par bsams la /
analyzed: de yongs su rdzogs pa las yang sna tshogs pa rnam par bsams la /
translated: From that, one should imagine a multicolored vajra.

original: snying po gdon pas rdo rje kha thur du bltas pas sa la bzhag nas nam mkha' thams cad kyi @77b gnas la rab tu gnas par gyur pa rnams /
analyzed: snying po gdon pas rdo rje kha thur du bltas pas sa la bzhag nas nam mkha' thams cad kyi @77b gnas la rab tu gnas par gyur pa rnams /
translated: Reciting the essence mantra, one should place the vajra, facing downward, on the ground, and all the places in space become fully present.

original: aa nu r'a ga ya h'um /
analyzed: aa nu r'a ga ya h'um /
translated: anu rāgaya hūṃ

original: zhes brjod cing de ltar mos pas sna tshogs pa'i padma'i gdan bskyed la /
analyzed: zhes brjod cing de ltar mos pas sna tshogs pa'i padma'i gdan bskyed la /
translated: Having said that and imagined it thus, one should generate the various lotus seats.

original: dngos po'i sbyor ba la sogs pa'i go rims ji lta bas rtag par gyur nas yang bdag nyid kyis gtam gyi phyag rgya dang rjes su mthun pas 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la bltas nas /
analyzed: dngos po'i sbyor ba la sogs pa'i go rims ji lta bas rtag par gyur nas yang bdag nyid kyis gtam gyi phyag rgya dang rjes su mthun pas 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la bltas nas /
translated: Then, in the order of the application of the entities and so forth, having become constant, one should again look at sentient beings who engage in passion with a mind that accords with the seal of speech.

original: de rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje sems dpa' bsams la /
analyzed: de rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje sems dpa' bsams la /
translated: Then, in order to take them into one’s care, one should imagine Vajrasattva in one’s heart center.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i glus yang dag par bskul na rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i glus yang dag par bskul na rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one perfectly incants with the song “the bliss of glorious Vajrasattva,” and so on, one will become Vajrasattva.

original: de ltar dang po'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa la stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i glus bskul ba'i phyir rang gi snying po brjod pas bdag nyid kyi snying ga las lha mo'i tshogs rnams phyung ste /
analyzed: de ltar dang po'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa la stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i glus bskul ba'i phyir rang gi snying po brjod pas bdag nyid kyi snying ga las lha mo'i tshogs rnams phyung ste /
translated: Thus, one should incant with the song “the emptiness of the utterly pure yoga,” and so on, in order to arouse the one endowed with the first yoga.

original: rang gi bdag po'i glu'i rjes su 'gro ba'i phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rang gi gnas su nges par 'jog pa 'di ni rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: rang gi bdag po'i glu'i rjes su 'gro ba'i phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rang gi gnas su nges par 'jog pa 'di ni rnam pa gnyis so //
translated: The great seal that follows the song of one's lord is definitely placed in one's place, which is twofold.

original: yang la la dag ni yi ge ho dmar po 'bar ba'i bar du bcug pa'i yi ge h'um gi bdag nyid can rang gi sems tsam gyis sbyor ba'i bdag nyid kyi phyag rgya nyid bkug nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhu bar gyur pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba chen
analyzed: yang la la dag ni yi ge ho dmar po 'bar ba'i bar du bcug pa'i yi ge h'um gi bdag nyid can rang gi sems tsam gyis sbyor ba'i bdag nyid kyi phyag rgya nyid bkug nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhu bar gyur pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba chen
translated: Moreover, some [say that] one should summon the seal of one's nature, which is the nature of the syllable hūṃ, inserted between the blazing red syllable hoḥ, with just one's mind, and having dissolved the moon maṇḍala into the great cakravartin,

original: po las rang gi sngags kyi rang gi lcags kyus bkug nas zhugs nas phyogs bcu thams cad kyi stobs bcu dang ldan pa'ang zhugs par byas la /
analyzed: po las rang gi sngags kyi rang gi lcags kyus bkug nas zhugs nas phyogs bcu thams cad kyi stobs bcu dang ldan pa'ang zhugs par byas la /
translated: one should summon with one's mantra hook and enter. Having entered, one should also cause the ten powers of the ten directions to enter.

original: de rnams bde ba'i mchog la sogs pa'i gzugs su gyur te /
analyzed: de rnams bde ba'i mchog la sogs pa'i gzugs su gyur te /
translated: Those become the forms of Sukra and so on.

original: slong ba dang yang dag par bskul ba la sogs pa mngon par 'gro bas rang gi lha mo bzhi rnams kyis ji lta bar bskul bas bdag 'byung bar gyur pa la lha rnams 'byin pa yang snying ga'i rdo rje'i lte bar gnas pa'i rang gi rig pa dang
analyzed: slong ba dang yang dag par bskul ba la sogs pa mngon par 'gro bas rang gi lha mo bzhi rnams kyis ji lta bar bskul bas bdag 'byung bar gyur pa la lha rnams 'byin pa yang snying ga'i rdo rje'i lte bar gnas pa'i rang gi rig pa dang
translated: The four goddesses, one's own goddesses, urge one to arise, as one is urged by the supplicants and the correct urgers, and so forth.

original: gnyis su med par gyur pa'i bdag po'i mthar thug pa'i byang chub kyi sems gos dang 'dra ba las 'byung bar blta bar bya'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gnyis su med par gyur pa'i bdag po'i mthar thug pa'i byang chub kyi sems gos dang 'dra ba las 'byung bar blta bar bya'o zhes zer ro //
translated: One should view the emergence of the deities as from the bindu of bodhicitta, which is like a garment, of the lord, who is nondual with one's knowledge residing in the center of the heart vajra.

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'o //
translated: The perfect buddhas are Vajrasattva and so forth.

original: de nyid 'char bar byed pas na nyi zla'o //
analyzed: de nyid 'char bar byed pas na nyi zla'o //
translated: Since they arise from that, they are the sun and moon.

original: nges pa'i lam ni glu'i cha ma tra phyed tsam pa'i cha ste /
analyzed: nges pa'i lam ni glu'i cha ma tra phyed tsam pa'i cha ste /
translated: The path of certainty is half a matra of the song.

original: ci rigs par rings pa dang / bar ma dang / brdal @78a * //
analyzed: ci rigs par rings pa dang / bar ma dang / brdal @78a * //
translated: One should enter with certainty by the quick, medium, and slow🔽songs, respectively.

original: bas nges par 'jug pa ni rnam par 'das pa'o //
analyzed: bas nges par 'jug pa ni rnam par 'das pa'o //
translated: The certain entry is the transcendence.

original: brtan zhing grub pa slong byed pa //
analyzed: brtan zhing grub pa slong byed pa //
translated: The one who causes the stable and accomplished to arise🔽is the one who is to be known as the hero.

original: zhes bya ba ni dang po rab tu rtsom par byed pa dang / rab tu sgrub par byed pa la sogs pa brtan pa sar pa slong bar byed pa ni brtan pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dang po rab tu rtsom par byed pa dang / rab tu sgrub par byed pa la sogs pa brtan pa sar pa slong bar byed pa ni brtan pa zhes bya ste /
translated: This is called “firm” because it is the beginning of the firm, the beginning of the firm such as the one who is beginning to practice, the one who is beginning to accomplish.

original: glu bzang ba gang dang gang rtsom par byed pa la bya'o //
analyzed: glu bzang ba gang dang gang rtsom par byed pa la bya'o //
translated: It is the one who is beginning to sing well, the one who is beginning to sing whatever.

original: de skad du brtan pa la sogs pa'i glu blang bar bya'o zhes bshad pas so //
analyzed: de skad du brtan pa la sogs pa'i glu blang bar bya'o zhes bshad pas so //
translated: It is explained that one should sing the song of the firm, etc.

original: de nyid brtan par bya pa'i phyir stong pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid brtan par bya pa'i phyir stong pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to make that firm, he declares “emptiness,” etc.

original: lha mo thams cad dang stong pa nyid kyi ro nges par sbyor ba gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: lha mo thams cad dang stong pa nyid kyi ro nges par sbyor ba gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: The one who is definitely joined with the taste of all goddesses and emptiness is so-called.

original: kye nyid la nges par sbyor ba can sems can gyis yongs su brtags pa'i gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa gang yin pa de rnams med pas stong pa'o //
analyzed: kye nyid la nges par sbyor ba can sems can gyis yongs su brtags pa'i gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa gang yin pa de rnams med pas stong pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of those objects and subjects imagined by sentient beings is definitely joined with the “Oṃ” of the mind.

original: mthu ni de la dmigs pa'i zag pa med pa'i ye shes kyi bye brag ste /
analyzed: mthu ni de la dmigs pa'i zag pa med pa'i ye shes kyi bye brag ste /
translated: Power is the particularity of the uncontaminated wisdom that has that as its object.

original: de rnams kyis nam mkha' nyid du nye bar gnas pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyis nam mkha' nyid du nye bar gnas pa ste /
translated: They are situated in space itself.

original: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par gyur pas byang chub kyi sems ji lta ba bzhin du 'thob pa'o zhes la la dag 'dod do //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par gyur pas byang chub kyi sems ji lta ba bzhin du 'thob pa'o zhes la la dag 'dod do //
translated: Thus, some maintain that the bodhicitta is attained just as it is by the nonduality of means and insight.

original: de la dam tshig ni de nyid 'da' bar mi bya ba yin pas so //
analyzed: de la dam tshig ni de nyid 'da' bar mi bya ba yin pas so //
translated: In this regard, the pledge is that very thing which is not to be transgressed.

original: de ltar gyur pa'i bde bar gshegs pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa'i bde bar gshegs pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: The Sugata who is such is Vajrasattva.

original: bde bar gshegs pa zhes pa ni rtag pa la sogs pa'o //🔽bzhengs su gsol zhes pa ni /
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa zhes pa ni rtag pa la sogs pa'o // bzhengs su gsol zhes pa ni /
translated: The Sugata is the eternal, etc.

original: rnal 'byor dang rjes su mthun pa'i tshul du 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dang rjes su mthun pa'i tshul du 'jug pa'o //
translated: The invocation is the entry into the yoga and the subsequent yoga.🔽The Vajrasattva is the exclamation “O Vajrasattva!”🔽The “I” is the self-identification with the good fortune of the accomplishment of the Vajrasattva.🔽The “I” is the self-identification with the good fortune of the accomplishment of the Vajrasattva.🔽The “I” is the self-identification with the good fortune of the accomplishment of the Vajrasattva.

translated: Disciplining them is the generation of the bliss and mental joy of Vajrasattva’s touch.

original: de la mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //🔽rnam pa @80a * //
analyzed: de la mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no // rnam pa @80a * //
translated: Here, skill is as before.

original: mang po'i khro bo'i rgyud ces pa ni srog gcod par byed pa'i sems can ma lus pa lus pa med pa de rnams kyang de bzhin du shes par bya ste /
analyzed: mang po'i khro bo'i rgyud ces pa ni srog gcod par byed pa'i sems can ma lus pa lus pa med pa de rnams kyang de bzhin du shes par bya ste /
translated: Many kinds of wrathful tantras means that all sentient beings who are killers should be understood in the same way.

original: de rnams bsdu ba ni srog nye bar bsdu bas bde bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams bsdu ba ni srog nye bar bsdu bas bde bar byed pa ste /
translated: The collection of them is the bliss that is the collection of life.

original: de la mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no ;
analyzed: de la mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no ;
translated: Here, skill is as before.

original: / rten phra rten h'um /
analyzed: / rten phra rten h'um /
translated: The subtle support is the hūṃ.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bskul ba'i dam tshig yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bskul ba'i dam tshig yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that the pledge of urging is the hūṃ.

original: de rnams nyid kyis ni shin tu sbyor ba ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa'i rim pas rjes su chags pa la sogs pa'i las rnams yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams nyid kyis ni shin tu sbyor ba ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa'i rim pas rjes su chags pa la sogs pa'i las rnams yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that the action of passion, and so on is the sequence of abiding in the union just as it is.

original: grub pa'i dbang phyug ni dngos grub la dbang thob pa'o //
analyzed: grub pa'i dbang phyug ni dngos grub la dbang thob pa'o //
translated: The lord of adepts is one who has attained power over spiritual attainments.

original: de'i bar du grub pa ni sbyor ba mthar phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bar du grub pa ni sbyor ba mthar phyin pa'o //
translated: The attainment in between is the culmination of the practice.

original: grub par 'gyur zhes pa ni de rnams kyis shes par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: grub par 'gyur zhes pa ni de rnams kyis shes par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: “They will be accomplished” means that they will be known by those.

original: glu 'di dag ni zhes pa ni ji skad du bshad pa'i glu dang phyag rgya rnams kyis so //
analyzed: glu 'di dag ni zhes pa ni ji skad du bshad pa'i glu dang phyag rgya rnams kyis so //
translated: “These songs” are the songs and gestures as they have been explained.

original: ston pa'i zhes pa ni lha rnams so ;
analyzed: ston pa'i zhes pa ni lha rnams so ;
translated: “The teachers” are the deities.

original: / phyag rgya phab pa ni phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pas 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: / phyag rgya phab pa ni phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pas 'grub pa'o //
translated: “The descent of the seal” is the accomplishment by the consecration of the seal.

original: de 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
analyzed: de 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
translated: Not only that,

original: bde ba'i mchog la sogs pa'i bud med bsgom pa las brtson pas kyang 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba'i mchog la sogs pa'i bud med bsgom pa las brtson pas kyang 'grub pa'o //
translated: but also those who are diligent in the meditation on the women such as Supreme Bliss will be accomplished.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bud med ma yin pa ste skyes pa dag kyang phyag rgya de 'bebs na'o ;
analyzed: bud med ma yin pa ste skyes pa dag kyang phyag rgya de 'bebs na'o ;
translated: Even men, who are not women, will descend the seal.

original: / rdo rjer bcas pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor ma rang gi lhag pa'i lha rnams 'dra bar byin gyis brlab pa ni 'bebs pa ste /
analyzed: / rdo rjer bcas pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor ma rang gi lhag pa'i lha rnams 'dra bar byin gyis brlab pa ni 'bebs pa ste /
translated: The yoginīs who hold the insignia with the vajra are consecrated as similar to one’s own special deity.

original: des nye bar mdzes par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: des nye bar mdzes par gyur pa'o //
translated: They are “adorned with that.”

original: sngon med rol mo sil snyan gar //
analyzed: sngon med rol mo sil snyan gar //
translated: The unprecedented music, cymbals, and dance,

original: rnam par 'phrul pas zhes bya ba ni gling bu la sogs pa rnams kyis so ;
analyzed: rnam par 'phrul pas zhes bya ba ni gling bu la sogs pa rnams kyis so ;
translated: By means of emanations refers to those of the flute, etc.

original: /'grub par 'gyur ba ni nges par ro //
analyzed: /'grub par 'gyur ba ni nges par ro //
translated: One will certainly attain refers to the definite.

original: lha'i gzugs la sogs pa ni sprul pas so //
analyzed: lha'i gzugs la sogs pa ni sprul pas so //
translated: The divine forms, etc. are emanations.

original: rang gi lha ni gnas kyi bdag por bdag nyid mthong ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi lha ni gnas kyi bdag por bdag nyid mthong ba'o //
translated: One sees oneself as one's own deity, as the lord of the place.

original: mchod pa ni lha'i mchod pa me tog la sogs pa rnams te /
analyzed: mchod pa ni lha'i mchod pa me tog la sogs pa rnams te /
translated: Worship is the worship of the deity with flowers, etc.

original: de rnams kyis mnyam par sbyor ba ni mchod pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyis mnyam par sbyor ba ni mchod pa'o //
translated: The union with them is worship.

original: des na skal ba bzang po ste de nyid kyis na mchog gi 'dod chags can no //
analyzed: des na skal ba bzang po ste de nyid kyis na mchog gi 'dod chags can no //
translated: Thus, one is fortunate, and by that very fact, one is a supreme lover.

original: rnam pa kun gyi skal ba bzang po ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa kun gyi skal ba bzang po ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: One is fortunate in every way by possessing the union with Vajrasattva.

original: skyon med pa ni bde ba 'di nyid yang dag par sgrub par byed pa ni yongs su spyod pa'o //
analyzed: skyon med pa ni bde ba 'di nyid yang dag par sgrub par byed pa ni yongs su spyod pa'o //
translated: One is faultless, and the complete enjoyment of this very bliss is the enjoyment.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub ni de la sbyor @80b ba des na de lhan cig sbyor ba de las dngos grub thams cad kyi bde ba'i dkyil 'khor rjes su myong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub ni de la sbyor @80b ba des na de lhan cig sbyor ba de las dngos grub thams cad kyi bde ba'i dkyil 'khor rjes su myong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The power of glorious Vajrasattva is united with that, and from that union, the mandala of the bliss of all powers is experienced.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sangs rgyas sgyu mas byin brlabs pas //🔽zhes pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas sgyu mas byin brlabs pas // zhes pa ste /
translated: Because of the blessing of the Buddha's illusion.

original: bde ba'i mchog la sogs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sgyu ma'i nus pa bskyed pas so //
analyzed: bde ba'i mchog la sogs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sgyu ma'i nus pa bskyed pas so //
translated: Because of the generation of the power of the Buddha's illusion, such as the supreme bliss.

original: de ltar glu yis bskul ba'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar glu yis bskul ba'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the greatness of the one urged by the song,

original: rgyal mtshan nye bar bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyal mtshan nye bar bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the victory banner,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “Then,” and so on.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni bskul ba'i 'og tu'o //🔽bud med dag ni bzhi rnams dang // zhes pa ni me tog la sogs pa mchod pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis so //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni bskul ba'i 'og tu'o // bud med dag ni bzhi rnams dang // zhes pa ni me tog la sogs pa mchod pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis so //
translated: “ Then” is after the urging.🔽“ The four women” are the yoginīs of the offering of flowers, and so on.

original: gar gyi phyag rgya'i mchod pa yis //
analyzed: gar gyi phyag rgya'i mchod pa yis //
translated: “ With the offering of the dance gesture”

original: zhes pa ni dang po gar bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni dang po gar bya ba ste /
translated: is the dance at the beginning.

original: 'di nyid kyi 'og nas gyen du 'degs pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya bcing bas so //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi 'og nas gyen du 'degs pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya bcing bas so //
translated: One should bind the mudra of offering, such as lifting up and so on, below this.

original: mchod pa thams cad ces pa ji ltar ltar bdag nyid lha mo thams cad dang 'dus pa'i me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa'o //
analyzed: mchod pa thams cad ces pa ji ltar ltar bdag nyid lha mo thams cad dang 'dus pa'i me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa'o //
translated: All offerings are as many as all goddesses, such as the offering of flowers and so on.

original: de ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
translated: This is what is taught.

original: go rims snga mas dkyil 'khor gyi mchog gi ting nge 'dzin byas la /
analyzed: go rims snga mas dkyil 'khor gyi mchog gi ting nge 'dzin byas la /
translated: Having performed the supreme mandala samadhi in the former order,

original: glu rnams kyi bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du bskyed la 'dus pa bya zhing dbang bskur ba thob nas lcags kyu la sogs pas spyan drang pa la sogs pa byas te /
analyzed: glu rnams kyi bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du bskyed la 'dus pa bya zhing dbang bskur ba thob nas lcags kyu la sogs pas spyan drang pa la sogs pa byas te /
translated: one should generate the nature of the songs, perform the assembly, and having obtained the empowerment, one should perform the invocation and so on with the hook and so on.

original: mchod pa phul nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis rang gi lha'i phyag rgyas mchod pa la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: mchod pa phul nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis rang gi lha'i phyag rgyas mchod pa la sogs pa bya'o //
translated: Having made the offerings, one should perform the offerings and so on with the karma mudras and one's own deity's mudra.

original: de ltar las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par byas nas /
analyzed: de ltar las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par byas nas /
translated: Having thus completed the supreme karma raja samadhi,

original: dpal bde ba chen po'i phyag rgya dang / yi ge h'um gyis 'khor lo bteg la de bzhin du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas yongs su bskor ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: dpal bde ba chen po'i phyag rgya dang / yi ge h'um gyis 'khor lo bteg la de bzhin du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas yongs su bskor ba nas brtsams te /
translated: Then, with the great bliss mudra and the syllable HUM, lift up the wheel and, having blessed oneself in the same way, begin to turn the wheel.

original: dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bris la shin tu bsgrub par bya ba'i bud med la gsang ba'i lcags kyus h'um dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo la bstim zhing 'dus pa byas la bstod nas spyan drang ba la sogs pa bya ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bris la shin tu bsgrub par bya ba'i bud med la gsang ba'i lcags kyus h'um dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo la bstim zhing 'dus pa byas la bstod nas spyan drang ba la sogs pa bya ste /
translated: Then, having drawn the mandala just as it is, one should practice the secret hook with a woman who is to be thoroughly accomplished, dissolving her into the wheel with HUM, and having made union, one should praise her and do the invocation, and so on.

original: mchod yon phul nas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab ste /
analyzed: mchod yon phul nas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab ste /
translated: Having offered the libation, seal with the four seals.

original: dbang bskur nas bum pa lnga la sogs pa'i cho ga rjes su bsgrubs la /
analyzed: dbang bskur nas bum pa lnga la sogs pa'i cho ga rjes su bsgrubs la /
translated: Having conferred the empowerment, one should perform the subsequent rite of the five vases, and so on.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rang gi gsang ba'i de kho na nyid 'di nyid kyi me tog la sogs pa'i @81a * //🔽mchod pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rang gi gsang ba'i de kho na nyid 'di nyid kyi me tog la sogs pa'i @81a * //🔽mchod pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should offer to the Bhagavat and his retinue the flower and so on of one's own secret suchness.

original: rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
translated: Homage to me, the greatly joyful one, is Vajrasattva.

analyzed: bdag la dam tshig mchog grub par mdzod cig ces bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Bestow on me the accomplishment of the supreme commitment, is the application.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam par grub par mdzod //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam par grub par mdzod //
translated: Accomplish the supreme commitment of the Tathagata.

original: aom h'um / zhes bya ba ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pa /
analyzed: aom h'um / zhes bya ba ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pa /
translated: Om hum is the nature of mirror-like primordial wisdom.

original: me tog gi de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: me tog gi de kho na nyid do //
translated: This is the reality of the flower.

original: dam tshig dam pa zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pa 'dug pas so //
analyzed: dam tshig dam pa zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pa 'dug pas so //
translated: The supreme commitment is the nature of the primordial wisdom of equality.

original: mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzod //
analyzed: mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzod //
translated: Accomplish all the great offerings.🔽Om hum is the nature of the primordial wisdom of discernment.🔽The lamp is to be understood.🔽The great offering is the nature of the primordial wisdom of successful activities.🔽The incense is to be understood.

original: aom h'um zhes bya ba ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pa mar mes so //
analyzed: aom h'um zhes bya ba ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pa mar mes so //

original: yang mchod pa chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pa byug pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: yang mchod pa chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pa byug pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: The great offering is the nature of the mirror-like primordial wisdom.🔽The mandala is to be understood.🔽The great offering is the nature of the primordial wisdom of discernment.🔽The praise is to be understood.🔽The great offering is the nature of the primordial wisdom of successful activities.🔽The supplication is to be understood.🔽The great offering is the nature of the mirror-like primordial wisdom.🔽The torma is to be understood.🔽The great offering is the nature of the primordial wisdom of discernment.🔽The dedication is to be understood.🔽The great

original: phyag rgya 'di zhes pa ni gsang ba'i rgyud kyi phyag rgyas so //
analyzed: phyag rgya 'di zhes pa ni gsang ba'i rgyud kyi phyag rgyas so //
translated: This mudra is the mudra of the secret tantra.

original: mchod pa thams cad ni me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa'o //
analyzed: mchod pa thams cad ni me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa'o //
translated: All offerings are the offerings of flowers, etc.

original: 'di dag dang zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i rang gi gsang ba'i de kho na nyid dang ste me tog la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams dang rang gi phyag rgya ji lta ba mchod pa bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag dang zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i rang gi gsang ba'i de kho na nyid dang ste me tog la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams dang rang gi phyag rgya ji lta ba mchod pa bya'o //
translated: With these is the previously explained secret reality of oneself, and the goddesses of flowers, etc., and one's own mudra, as they are, one should make offerings.

original: med na bdag nyid kyis bya'o //
analyzed: med na bdag nyid kyis bya'o //
translated: If they are not present, one should do it oneself.

original: de nas slob ma thams cad gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas slob ma thams cad gzung bar bya'o //
translated: Then one should take all the disciples.

original: de la go rims ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la go rims ni 'di yin te /
translated: The sequence is as follows:

original: dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin la go rims snga mas mchod pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du rdzogs par byas la phyag la sogs pa bya ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin la go rims snga mas mchod pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du rdzogs par byas la phyag la sogs pa bya ste /
translated: In the maṇḍala just as it is, having completed the sequence up to the conclusion of the offerings, one should make prostrations, etc.

original: bdag nyid zhugs nas bdag thams cad kyi slob dpon du dbang bskur zhing sna tshogs 'byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa mngon par phyogs par bsgoms la /
analyzed: bdag nyid zhugs nas bdag thams cad kyi slob dpon du dbang bskur zhing sna tshogs 'byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa mngon par phyogs par bsgoms la /
translated: Having entered oneself, having been empowered as the master of all, and having visualized the Blessed One of various origins together with the retinue facing oneself,

original: bdag nyid rdo rje bdag nyid dang / ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa dang / bdag med pas mnyam pa nyid kyis lha thams cad dang / gcig tu gyur par rim bzhin du //
analyzed: bdag nyid rdo rje bdag nyid dang / ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa dang / bdag med pas mnyam pa nyid kyis lha thams cad dang / gcig tu gyur par rim bzhin du //
translated: I am the same as all deities by way of selflessness.🔽One should recite:

original: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham /
translated: Oṃ vajra ātmāko ’haṃ

original: aom svabh'a shuddhonyaham /
analyzed: aom svabh'a shuddhonyaham /
translated: Oṃ svabhāva śuddho ’haṃ

original: aom sarba sa ma yo& ham /
analyzed: aom sarba sa ma yo& ham /
translated: Oṃ sarva samayo ’haṃ

original: zhes brjod la bdag nyid lhag par mos pas der dbus su 'dug ste /
analyzed: zhes brjod la bdag nyid lhag par mos pas der dbus su 'dug ste /
translated: and, with the imagination of oneself as the deity, one should sit in the center.

original: bdag nyid kyis rol mo'i rjes su 'gro ba'i glu 'don bzhin du gtam dang / phyag mtshan dang / phyag rgyal sogs pa shin tu mnyam par gzhag nas bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis rol mo'i rjes su 'gro ba'i glu 'don bzhin du gtam dang / phyag mtshan dang / phyag rgyal sogs pa shin tu mnyam par gzhag nas bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: One should practice with great concentration, singing songs that follow the music, speaking, hand implements, mudras, and so forth.

original: gang gi tshe rjes @81b su bsgrub par 'dod pa de'i tshe bdag la dbang bskur ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar du rdzogs par bya ba la sogs pa byas la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rjes @81b su bsgrub par 'dod pa de'i tshe bdag la dbang bskur ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar du rdzogs par bya ba la sogs pa byas la /
translated: When one wishes to practice the subsequent practice, one should perform the complete self-empowerment and so forth.

original: slob ma gzhug pa'i phyir gsol ba btab ste /
analyzed: slob ma gzhug pa'i phyir gsol ba btab ste /
translated: Then, in order to induct the disciples, one should request them to do so.

original: bdag byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas /
analyzed: bdag byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas /
translated: Having performed the self-consecration and so forth,

original: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i sbyor bar slob ma byas te /🔽shi ri su kha badzra satva su bha ga stvam ma ham /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i sbyor bar slob ma byas te / shi ri su kha badzra satva su bha ga stvam ma ham /
translated: Having made the disciple into the master of the maṇḍala,

original: zhes brjod la /
analyzed: zhes brjod la /
translated: one should recite:🔽“Śrīsukhavajra, you are my deity, you are my refuge, great one.🔽”

original: gar sngon du 'gro ba'i thal mo sbyar la spyi bor bzhag ste /
analyzed: gar sngon du 'gro ba'i thal mo sbyar la spyi bor bzhag ste /
translated: Having performed the dance beforehand, one should join the palms together and place them on the head.

original: me tog gi phreng ba dang bcas pa'i lam glu dbul bar bya ste /
analyzed: me tog gi phreng ba dang bcas pa'i lam glu dbul bar bya ste /
translated: One should offer the path song together with a garland of flowers.

original: rdo rje bdag po'i snying po brjod pas gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bdag po'i snying po brjod pas gzhug par bya'o //
translated: One should enter with the recitation of the essence of the vajra lord.

original: cho ga'i bya ba thams cad kyang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: cho ga'i bya ba thams cad kyang brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should also recite all the ritual actions.

original: de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang stong par shin tu sbyor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i glu dang bcas pas bskul ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / yang rim pa de nyid kyis rdo rje sems dpa' ltar bskyed la /
