analyzed: kun nas lha mo thams cad dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
translated: is the complete possession of all the goddesses.

original: kun du sna tshogs 'khor lo can ni thams cad du sna tshogs shing ma lus pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: kun du sna tshogs 'khor lo can ni thams cad du sna tshogs shing ma lus pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa ste /
translated: The universal variety wheel is endowed with a universal variety of retinues.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: It is Vajrasattva.

original: kun du sna tshogs grub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: kun du sna tshogs grub pa'i phyir //
translated: Because of the universal variety of accomplishments.

original: zhes pa ni sngar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du 'di'i yang nang du zur bzhi pa la sogs pa kun nas rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sngar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du 'di'i yang nang du zur bzhi pa la sogs pa kun nas rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
translated: Just like the previously explained mandala, this one also has four corners, etc., inside, and is completely perfect in every way.

original: de ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad dang 'dra ba las /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad dang 'dra ba las /
translated: Like all mandalas,

original: nang du yang zur bzhi nyid la sogs pa dang ldan par byas la ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes par bya ba'i rdo rje thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: nang du yang zur bzhi nyid la sogs pa dang ldan par byas la ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes par bya ba'i rdo rje thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: inside it has four corners, etc., and is beautified by eight pillars. The vajra lines should be drawn.

original: de'i phyi rol du zur bzhi pa gnyis pa sgo dang bcas pa sna gcig gis bris pa ni dkyil @83b 'khor kun du sna tshogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyi rol du zur bzhi pa gnyis pa sgo dang bcas pa sna gcig gis bris pa ni dkyil @83b 'khor kun du sna tshogs pa ste /
translated: Outside of that, the second one with four corners and a door, drawn with a single line, is the universal variety mandala.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: It is the mandala of Vajrasattva.

original: de dag thams cad kyi phyi rol du dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad la ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor cig shos la ni rang gi tshon sna gcig gis bris par blta bar bya'o ;
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyi phyi rol du dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad la ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor cig shos la ni rang gi tshon sna gcig gis bris par blta bar bya'o ;
translated: Outside of all of them, one should see the other half of the mandala, adorned with eight pillars, a vajra-circle, drawn with one's own color.

original: / dkyil 'khor gyi nang yang de bzhin du bstan to /
analyzed: / dkyil 'khor gyi nang yang de bzhin du bstan to /
translated: The interior of the mandala is also taught in the same way.

original: phyi rol thams cad du yang snga ma bzhin du zur bzhir bya'o //
analyzed: phyi rol thams cad du yang snga ma bzhin du zur bzhir bya'o //
translated: And outside of all of it, one should make four corners as before.

original: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni zlum po de dag tu yang rdo rje'i thig skud btab la phyi rol du ni ri mo zur bzhi bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni zlum po de dag tu yang rdo rje'i thig skud btab la phyi rol du ni ri mo zur bzhi bya'o //
translated: The so-called mandala is a circle, and in it one should draw a vajra-line. Outside of it, one should make a four-cornered design.

original: rdo rje can gyi zhes bya ba ni he ru ka yi'o ;
analyzed: rdo rje can gyi zhes bya ba ni he ru ka yi'o ;
translated: The so-called vajra-possessor is Heruka.

original: / zla gam bzhin zhes bya ba ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: / zla gam bzhin zhes bya ba ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The so-called crescent is the wind maṇḍala.

original: rdo rje ra bas bskor ba'i phyi rol du ni ri mo zur bzhis bskor ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ra bas bskor ba'i phyi rol du ni ri mo zur bzhis bskor ba'o //
translated: Outside of the vajra fence, one should make a four-cornered design.

original: padma'i dbyibs zhes bya ba ni padma 'dab ma brgyad pa 'dra ba la padma'i phreng bas bskor ba'o //
analyzed: padma'i dbyibs zhes bya ba ni padma 'dab ma brgyad pa 'dra ba la padma'i phreng bas bskor ba'o //
translated: The lotus shape is like an eight-petaled lotus, surrounded by a garland of lotuses.

original: phyi rol du ri mo zur bzhis bskor ba'o //
analyzed: phyi rol du ri mo zur bzhis bskor ba'o //
translated: Outside, it is surrounded by four-sided lines.

original: rin chen dbyibs zhes bya ba ni rin po che zur brgyad pa 'dra ba la /
analyzed: rin chen dbyibs zhes bya ba ni rin po che zur brgyad pa 'dra ba la /
translated: The jewel shape is like an eight-faceted jewel,

original: rin po che'i lcug mas yongs su bskor ba phyi rol du ni ri mo zur bzhis bskor ba'o //
analyzed: rin po che'i lcug mas yongs su bskor ba phyi rol du ni ri mo zur bzhis bskor ba'o //
translated: surrounded by jewel vines, and outside, surrounded by four-sided lines.

original: ji ltar 'dod pa ni ji ltar dga' ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa ni ji ltar dga' ba'o //
translated: As one wishes means as one likes.

original: ci 'byor ba ni ci rnyed pas so //
analyzed: ci 'byor ba ni ci rnyed pas so //
translated: As one can afford means as much as one can get.

original: dkyil 'khor lnga po 'di dag las 'di'i dkyil 'khor ni des pa med pas 'di'i gnas su dpal rta mchog gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor lnga po 'di dag las 'di'i dkyil 'khor ni des pa med pas 'di'i gnas su dpal rta mchog gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Among these five maṇḍalas, since this maṇḍala is the best, one should place Śrī Hayagrīva in its place.

original: de nyid de'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: de nyid de'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: That itself becomes its maṇḍala.

original: ci lta ci ltar 'dod dang zhes bya ba ni mngon spyod dang dbang du bya ba la sogs pa dang / rgyas pa'i las rnams la ci 'dod pa thams cad do //
analyzed: ci lta ci ltar 'dod dang zhes bya ba ni mngon spyod dang dbang du bya ba la sogs pa dang / rgyas pa'i las rnams la ci 'dod pa thams cad do //
translated: As one wishes means all that one wishes for in the rites of killing, enthralling, and so on, and in the rite of enriching.

original: ji lta'i dus dang ni snga dro dang / mtshan mo dang / nyi ma phyed dang / phyi dro rnams su rim bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du rim bzhin 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: ji lta'i dus dang ni snga dro dang / mtshan mo dang / nyi ma phyed dang / phyi dro rnams su rim bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du rim bzhin 'jug pa'o //
translated: At what time? In the morning, evening, noon, and afternoon, one should enter the maṇḍala of Vajrasattva and so forth, respectively.

original: ci bde bar ni slob ma dbang bskur ba la sogs pa chu dang bsnga ma pa la sogs pa med par ro //
analyzed: ci bde bar ni slob ma dbang bskur ba la sogs pa chu dang bsnga ma pa la sogs pa med par ro //
translated: As one pleases is without water, initiation, and so forth.

original: rdo rje ni rdo rje rgya gram mo //
analyzed: rdo rje ni rdo rje rgya gram mo //
translated: The vajra is the vajra cross.

original: phyag na bsnams pas dpal rta mchog kyang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: phyag na bsnams pas dpal rta mchog kyang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Since he holds it in his hand, Śrī Hayagrīva is so called.

original: dkyil 'khor kun du ma zhugs shing //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor kun du ma zhugs shing //
translated: Not having entered all maṇḍalas

original: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor rnams su 'jug ma myong ba'o //🔽dam tshig rnams ni spangs pa dang // zhes pa ni dam tshig @84a * //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor rnams su 'jug ma myong ba'o // dam tshig rnams ni spangs pa dang // zhes pa ni dam tshig @84a * //
translated: means not having entered the maṇḍalas.🔽Abandoning the pledges

original: rnams mi srung ba'o //
analyzed: rnams mi srung ba'o //
translated: means not protecting the pledges.

original: gsang ba yang dag ces bya ba ni 'og nas bshad pa'i skal ba nyid kyis slob dpon skal ba bzang po'o //
analyzed: gsang ba yang dag ces bya ba ni 'og nas bshad pa'i skal ba nyid kyis slob dpon skal ba bzang po'o //
translated: The good fortune of the master is the good fortune of the master by virtue of the secret, which will be explained below.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gis na brtan zhing thog ma dang / tha ma med pa'i rnal 'byor pa dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: gang gis na brtan zhing thog ma dang / tha ma med pa'i rnal 'byor pa dmigs pa ste /
translated: By what? The yogi/nī who is steadfast, without beginning or end,

original: de mi spang ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //🔽kun du sna tshogs skal bzang por //
analyzed: de mi spang ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro // kun du sna tshogs skal bzang por //
translated: and who does not abandon the object.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
translated: The fortunate one is Vajrasattva,

original: de ni bdag nyid bsgrubs pas skal ba bzang po'o //
analyzed: de ni bdag nyid bsgrubs pas skal ba bzang po'o //
translated: who is fortunate by virtue of accomplishing the self.

original: bdag med chos nyid dang ldan pa ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mngon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: bdag med chos nyid dang ldan pa ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mngon par zhen pa'o //
translated: The one who is endowed with the reality of selflessness is the one who is attached to all phenomena as emptiness.

original: de'i khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de'i khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is his distinction?

original: dam tshig la sdang ba ste /
analyzed: dam tshig la sdang ba ste /
translated: He is hostile to the commitments,

original: de rjes su spyod pa la sdang ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de rjes su spyod pa la sdang ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: and he is hostile to the practice of that.

original: de nyid kyis na skal ba ngan pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na skal ba ngan pa'o //
translated: By that very fact, he is unfortunate.

original: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
translated: The Buddha is Vairocana,

original: de ni srid pa shin tu bsgrubs pa ste /
analyzed: de ni srid pa shin tu bsgrubs pa ste /
translated: who is the one who has accomplished existence.

original: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa rdzogs pas skal ba bzang po shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ni lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'o //
analyzed: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa rdzogs pas skal ba bzang po shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ni lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'o //
translated: The “extremely complete nirvana” is the attainment of the nirvana without remainder.

original: dpal phyag na rdo rje ni he ru ka'o //
analyzed: dpal phyag na rdo rje ni he ru ka'o //
translated: “ Glorious Vajrapani” is Heruka.

original: dam pa'i nor mchog sdud pa'i phyir //
analyzed: dam pa'i nor mchog sdud pa'i phyir //
translated: “ In order to gather the supreme wealth of the holy”

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis nor chen po sdud par ston pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis nor chen po sdud par ston pa'o //
translated: that he teaches the gathering of great wealth through the power of his own samadhi.

original: dka' thub ni lus yongs su gdung pa'o ;
analyzed: dka' thub ni lus yongs su gdung pa'o ;
translated: “ Ascetic” means one who torments the body.

original: / rgyal srid mchog rnams kun bsdus pas //
analyzed: / rgyal srid mchog rnams kun bsdus pas //
translated: “ Having gathered all the supreme kingdoms”

original: zhes bya ba ni drag po'i sbyor ba'i dbang phyug go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni drag po'i sbyor ba'i dbang phyug go //
translated: means that he is the lord of the application of violence.

original: thub pa ni ya mtshan can rnams so //
analyzed: thub pa ni ya mtshan can rnams so //
translated: “ Sage” means the wonder-workers.

original: kun gyi slob dpon ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa ste /
analyzed: kun gyi slob dpon ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa ste /
translated: “ Master of all” means the practitioner of Vajrasattva yoga.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpar sbyor bas /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpar sbyor bas /
translated: By uniting with glorious Vajrasattva,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid sbyor //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid sbyor //
translated: one unites with the nature of all the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas phyag rgya'i brnga yis ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas phyag rgya'i brnga yis ni //
translated: By the praise of the buddha seal,

original: slob dpon thams cad ces brjod do //🔽zhes pas so //
analyzed: slob dpon thams cad ces brjod do // zhes pas so //
translated: is called the master of all.

original: bde ba thams cad ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: bde ba thams cad ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: All bliss is Vajrasattva.

original: de'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo nyid de sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo nyid de sgrub pa'o //
translated: The nature of that is the accomplishment.

original: slob ma la sogs pa'i zhes pa'i sgras ni 'dir bu la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: slob ma la sogs pa'i zhes pa'i sgras ni 'dir bu la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The word “and so on” in “disciple and so on” includes the son and so on.

original: 'jug pas zhes pa ni slob mas so //
analyzed: 'jug pas zhes pa ni slob mas so //
translated: “By entering” is by the disciple.

original: g-yas pa yis ni zhes bya ba ni yon thogs pas so //
analyzed: g-yas pa yis ni zhes bya ba ni yon thogs pas so //
translated: “By the right” is by the one who offers the fee.

original: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid bshad nas gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid bshad nas gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Having explained the reality of the secret, one should enter.

original: kun du sna tshogs bla ma la //
analyzed: kun du sna tshogs bla ma la //
translated: The guru is all-diverse.

original: zhes pa'i sgras ni dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje slob dpon ni //
analyzed: zhes pa'i sgras ni dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje slob dpon ni //
translated: The word “and so on” in “the guru and so on” includes the maṇḍala master.

original: de ni @84b zhes bya ba ni gtang dka' ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni @84b zhes bya ba ni gtang dka' ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: “That” is the difficult to abandon and so on.

original: 'dod dgur gyur pa ni mngon par dga' ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod dgur gyur pa ni mngon par dga' ba'o //
translated: “Becoming whatever one wishes” is the delight.

original: sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi yon //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi yon //
translated: The quality of supreme buddhahood

original: zhes pa ni dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa'i he ru ka'i sbyor ba gang yin pa de'i go 'phang thob pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa'i he ru ka'i sbyor ba gang yin pa de'i go 'phang thob pa ste /
translated: is the attainment of the state of glorious Vajradhara Heruka.

original: yon gang zhig dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa la sbyor ba'i yon des so //
analyzed: yon gang zhig dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa la sbyor ba'i yon des so //
translated: The fee for the glorious Vajradhara is that fee.

original: padmo can padmo'i rigs kyi slob dpon gyi'o //
analyzed: padmo can padmo'i rigs kyi slob dpon gyi'o //
translated: The lotus-bearer is the master of the lotus family.

original: rdo rje nyi ma ni rin po che'i slob dpon gyi'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma ni rin po che'i slob dpon gyi'o //
translated: The vajra sun is the master of the jewel family.

original: shin tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni gling mchog chas rnams dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni gling mchog chas rnams dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The well-adorned is endowed with the supreme ornaments of the continents.

original: rta'i rgyal po zhes bya ba ni rta mgrin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi'o //🔽sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur ba //🔽zhes pa ni sangs rgyas nyid rin po che ste /
analyzed: rta'i rgyal po zhes bya ba ni rta mgrin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi'o // sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur ba // zhes pa ni sangs rgyas nyid rin po che ste /
translated: The king of horses is the master of the Maṇḍala of Hayagrīva.🔽The consecration of the jewel of the buddhas

original: des dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: des dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: is the consecration with the jewel of buddhahood itself.

original: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate just that, he says

original: spyi bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: spyi bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: the crown, etc.

original: sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan dang ka p'a la'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan gyis thams cad kyi slob dpon du dbang bskur ba'i phyir thod pa nyid rin po che 'am /
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan dang ka p'a la'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan gyis thams cad kyi slob dpon du dbang bskur ba'i phyir thod pa nyid rin po che 'am /
translated: Since all are consecrated as masters by the crown ornament of the five buddhas and the crown ornament of the garland of kapālas, the skull itself is a jewel.

original: sangs rgyas nyid dbu rgyan no zhes tshig gis mtshams sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid dbu rgyan no zhes tshig gis mtshams sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: The Buddha is the crest jewel.

original: spyi bor dbu rgyan 'di nyid 'chang ba'i dbye ba ni 'di nyid yin par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: spyi bor dbu rgyan 'di nyid 'chang ba'i dbye ba ni 'di nyid yin par blta bar bya'o //
translated: This is the division of the crest jewel worn on the head.

original: rin po che gcig las byas pa ni sangs rgyas gcig gis mtshan pa dang / thod pa gcig gis mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: rin po che gcig las byas pa ni sangs rgyas gcig gis mtshan pa dang / thod pa gcig gis mtshan pa'o //
translated: The one made of a single jewel is marked with a single Buddha, and with a single skull.

original: de bzhin sna tshogs rgyan gyis spras //
analyzed: de bzhin sna tshogs rgyan gyis spras //
translated: Adorned with various ornaments.

original: zhes pa ni thams cad du lo ma dang / lcug ma sna tshogs pas spel ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni thams cad du lo ma dang / lcug ma sna tshogs pas spel ba'o //
translated: This is the spreading of various leaves and vines everywhere.

original: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to clarify that, he says the Buddha, etc.

original: sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur ba ni cod pa la sangs rgyas kyis mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur ba ni cod pa la sangs rgyas kyis mtshan pa'o //
translated: The Buddha consecration is the crest jewel marked with a Buddha.

original: padmas dbang bskur ba ni thod pas cod pan la mtshan pa ste /
analyzed: padmas dbang bskur ba ni thod pas cod pan la mtshan pa ste /
translated: The lotus consecration is the crest jewel marked with a skull.

original: de dag gis slob ma thams cad kyi bde ba'i mchog la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: de dag gis slob ma thams cad kyi bde ba'i mchog la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: By those, all disciples are consecrated by all yoginis, beginning with the supreme bliss.

original: rin chen rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rin po ches spras pa'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: rin chen rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rin po ches spras pa'i rdo rje'o //
translated: The jewel-vajra is the vajra adorned with jewels.

original: rdo rje yin zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'bar bas mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje yin zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'bar bas mtshan pa'o //
translated: The vajra is marked with a blazing vajra.

original: sangs rgyas sku zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag med kyi sku mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sku zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag med kyi sku mtshan pa'o //
translated: The buddha-body is marked with the body of Amitābha.

original: nor bu yin zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rin po che'o //🔽sangs rgyas rin chen zhes pa ni sangs rgyas rin po che ni @85a * //
analyzed: nor bu yin zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rin po che'o // sangs rgyas rin chen zhes pa ni sangs rgyas rin po che ni @85a * //
translated: The jewel is the jewel together with the vajra.

original: sangs rgyas rin chen te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin chen te /
translated: The buddha-jewel is the jewel of the Buddha.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rnam par snang mdzad gnyis kyi cod pa na gnyis so //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rnam par snang mdzad gnyis kyi cod pa na gnyis so //
translated: The vajra-jewel is the jewel of Vajrasattva.

original: padmo zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag med kyis dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: padmo zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag med kyis dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: The lotus is the consecration of Amitābha.

original: rdo rje zhes pa ni he ru ka'i dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes pa ni he ru ka'i dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: The vajra is the consecration of Heruka.

original: yid bzhin nor bu zhes pa ni rdo rje nyi ma'i dbang bskur ba'o //🔽thams cad mchog ni rta mchog la //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu zhes pa ni rdo rje nyi ma'i dbang bskur ba'o // thams cad mchog ni rta mchog la //
translated: The wish-fulfilling gem is the consecration of Vajrasūrya.

original: zhes bya ba ni rta mchog gi slob dpon gyi'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rta mchog gi slob dpon gyi'o //
translated: The supreme of all is the master of Hayagrīva.

original: mtshan ma'i phyag rgya zhes pa ni rdo rje la sogs pa'o //🔽de nyid kyi dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mtshan ma'i phyag rgya zhes pa ni rdo rje la sogs pa'o // de nyid kyi dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: The “sign-seal” is the vajra and so on.

original: kun du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /🔽kun du sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa dang bcas pa ni skal ba bzang po ni /
analyzed: kun du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / kun du sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa dang bcas pa ni skal ba bzang po ni /
translated: In order to teach its divisions, [the Bhagavān] declares, “all,” and so on.🔽“ All” refers to the various aspects, and “good fortune” is the good fortune of the various aspects.

original: kun du sna tshogs pa skal ba bzang po'o rang byung rnams kyi ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ste /
analyzed: kun du sna tshogs pa skal ba bzang po'o rang byung rnams kyi ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ste /
translated: The “self-arisen” are the vajrasattvas.

original: 'dir dam tshig gsum bstan pa ni rdo rje dang dril bu'i phyag rgya dang / spyan gyi phyag rgya dang / gzhu dang mda'i phyag rgya yin par shes par bya'o /
analyzed: 'dir dam tshig gsum bstan pa ni rdo rje dang dril bu'i phyag rgya dang / spyan gyi phyag rgya dang / gzhu dang mda'i phyag rgya yin par shes par bya'o /
translated: Here, the three pledges should be understood as the pledge of the vajra and bell, the pledge of the eye, and the pledge of the bow and arrow.🔽Are they just those?

original: ci de dag kho na zhe 'am nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ci de dag kho na zhe 'am nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [The Bhagavān] declares, “space,” and so on.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin du mthar thug pa med pa bde ba'i mchog la sogs pa lha mo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid gzhu dang mda'i gzugs kyis gnas pa ni /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin du mthar thug pa med pa bde ba'i mchog la sogs pa lha mo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid gzhu dang mda'i gzugs kyis gnas pa ni /
translated: The bow and arrow, in the form of the goddesses beginning with Sukarman, abide in the nature of the supreme bliss, which is like the realm of space, without end.

original: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The Blessed One's own seal of the sign.

original: mchog ces bya ba'ang de nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba'ang de nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that supreme is just that.

original: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir gzhu dang mda' dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir gzhu dang mda' dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach just that, [the Bhagavān] declares the bow and arrow, etc.

original: mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu ni bde ba mchog go //
analyzed: mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu ni bde ba mchog go //
translated: The bow with an arrow is supreme bliss.

original: skal ldan ni skyes pa'i mtshan no //
analyzed: skal ldan ni skyes pa'i mtshan no //
translated: The fortunate is the sign of a man.

original: skal ba bzang ni bha ga'i phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: skal ba bzang ni bha ga'i phyag rgya ste /
translated: The good fortune is the bhaga seal.

original: de'i steng du skal ldan gzhag pa ni ae ma bde ba'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du skal ldan gzhag pa ni ae ma bde ba'o //
translated: Placing the fortunate on top of that is amazing bliss.

original: thod pa dang / kha tv'am ga dang / sna tshogs rdo rje ni sgrol ma yi'o //
analyzed: thod pa dang / kha tv'am ga dang / sna tshogs rdo rje ni sgrol ma yi'o //
translated: The skull cup, khaṭvāṅga, and vajra cross are Tārā's.

original: thod pa kham phor dang / sna tshogs rdo rje la 'od dpag med kyi sku gzhag pa ni shi shi'o //
analyzed: thod pa kham phor dang / sna tshogs rdo rje la 'od dpag med kyi sku gzhag pa ni shi shi'o //
translated: The skull cup, bowl, and vajra cross with the form of Amitābha placed on top of that is Śiśi.

original: mdas phug pa'i 'og gzhi dang / gzhu ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bo //
analyzed: mdas phug pa'i 'og gzhi dang / gzhu ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bo //
translated: The base of the arrow's piercing and the bow are the enlightenment of the Buddha.

original: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa ni chos nyid kyi 'khor lo m'a ma k'i'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa ni chos nyid kyi 'khor lo m'a ma k'i'o //
translated: The eight-spoked wheel is the wheel of reality of Māmakī.

original: rdo rje rtse lnga pa ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ma yi'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rtse lnga pa ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ma yi'o //
translated: The five-pronged vajra is Jayā, the conqueror of the three worlds.

original: dpag bsam gyi shing lcug mas dkris pa ni 'dod pa thams cad kyi lcug ma yi'o //
analyzed: dpag bsam gyi shing lcug mas dkris pa ni 'dod pa thams cad kyi lcug ma yi'o //
translated: The wish-fulfilling tree wrapped in vines is Sarvārthasiddhi, the vine of all desires.

original: padma'i steng du mgos bstod nas /
analyzed: padma'i steng du mgos bstod nas /
translated: The lotus on top of the head is bowed to.

original: rta skad 'tsher ba'i rta mgo ldang gu ni rta gdong ma yi'o //
analyzed: rta skad 'tsher ba'i rta mgo ldang gu ni rta gdong ma yi'o //
translated: The horse head with a neighing sound is Hayakarṇa.

original: phag gi mche @85b ba ni rdo rje gdong gi'o //
analyzed: phag gi mche @85b ba ni rdo rje gdong gi'o //
translated: The tusk of the elephant is Vajrahasā.

original: zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje spyan gyi'o //
analyzed: zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje spyan gyi'o //
translated: The sun and moon disks are Vajranetra.

original: thod pa'i dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje la sangs rgyas kyis ku gzhag pa ni thal bas rab tu 'jug pa'i ro langs ma yi'o //
analyzed: thod pa'i dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje la sangs rgyas kyis ku gzhag pa ni thal bas rab tu 'jug pa'i ro langs ma yi'o //
translated: The vajra in the center of the skull cup with a buddha on top is Aśvagrīva.

original: rdo rje gling bu nir rgyud gcig ma yi'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gling bu nir rgyud gcig ma yi'o //
translated: The vajra flute is Ekavīṇā.

original: sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i pi wang ni rgyud mangs ma yi'o //🔽mu kunda ni sdug ma yin //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i pi wang ni rgyud mangs ma yi'o // mu kunda ni sdug ma yin //
translated: The lute marked with a vajra is Bahuvīṇā.🔽The mṛdaṅga drum is Ratipriyā.

original: rdza rda ni rdza rda ma yi'o //
analyzed: rdza rda ni rdza rda ma yi'o //
translated: The clay drum is Mṛdaṅga.

original: me tog gi za ma tog dang / spos khang gang ba dang / mar me'i sdong bu dang / dri yi phor bu ni go rims bzhin du me tog ma dang / bdug pa ma dang / mar me ma dang / dri chab ma yi'o //
analyzed: me tog gi za ma tog dang / spos khang gang ba dang / mar me'i sdong bu dang / dri yi phor bu ni go rims bzhin du me tog ma dang / bdug pa ma dang / mar me ma dang / dri chab ma yi'o //
translated: The flower basket, the filled incense case, the lamp wick, and the perfume bowl are, respectively, the gestures of the Flower Lady, the Incense Lady, the Lamp Lady, and the Perfume Lady.

original: chos gos dang / lhung bzed dang / 'khar gsil dang / dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam gyi phyag rgya ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
analyzed: chos gos dang / lhung bzed dang / 'khar gsil dang / dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam gyi phyag rgya ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
translated: The gestures of the Dharma robe, the alms bowl, the staff, and the book of the sublime Dharma are those of the Blessed One Vairocana.

original: lce'i phyag rgya dang / cha lang chung du dang / rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang / rin po che'i za ma tog ni rim bzhin du sangs rgyas kun brjod ma dang / rgyan can ma dang ; kun tu bzang mo dang / mi bzad pa'i za ma tog ma yi'o //
analyzed: lce'i phyag rgya dang / cha lang chung du dang / rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang / rin po che'i za ma tog ni rim bzhin du sangs rgyas kun brjod ma dang / rgyan can ma dang ; kun tu bzang mo dang / mi bzad pa'i za ma tog ma yi'o //
translated: The gestures of the tongue, the small drum, the five-pronged vajra, and the jewel basket are, respectively, those of the Buddha-reciting Lady, the Adorned Lady, the All-good Lady, and the Unendurable Basket Lady.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dang / me long dang / sbrin dang bcas pa'i rdo rje ser ba dang / mig gi phyag rgya ni rim bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad yan lag dang ldan ma dang / gzugs ma zhal bzangs ma dang ; sprin chen mod dang /🔽nam mkha'i spyan rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dang / me long dang / sbrin dang bcas pa'i rdo rje ser ba dang / mig gi phyag rgya ni rim bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad yan lag dang ldan ma dang / gzugs ma zhal bzangs ma dang ; sprin chen mod dang / nam mkha'i spyan rnams kyi'o //
translated: The images of the Buddha, the mirror, the vajra with cloud, and the eye gesture are, respectively, those of all the Buddhas, Aṅgīrasa, Subhaginī, and Mahāmegha.

original: rdo rje 'bar ba dang // ba tv'am ga dang bcas pa'i thod pa dang / dmar chen pos kham phor bkang ba yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'bar ba dang // ba tv'am ga dang bcas pa'i thod pa dang / dmar chen pos kham phor bkang ba yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: The vajra, the blazing vajra, the skull with a bat, and the bowl filled with great blood are, respectively, those of Ākāśagarbha, Ākāśa, Ākāśa-vajra, and Ākāśa-netra.

original: snying rje chen po ni snying gi padma ste /
analyzed: snying rje chen po ni snying gi padma ste /
translated: The great compassion is the heart lotus.

original: de nyid ni sha chen no //
analyzed: de nyid ni sha chen no //
translated: That itself is the great flesh.

original: phyag rgya de dag ni dpal he ru ka yi'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya de dag ni dpal he ru ka yi'o //
translated: Those are the seals of Śrī Heruka.

original: mda' rnon po dang / lcags kyu dang / chang dang chu rnams ni rim bzhin du dkar mo dang / rku byed ma dang / rab rmongs ma dang / ro langs ma yi'o //
analyzed: mda' rnon po dang / lcags kyu dang / chang dang chu rnams ni rim bzhin du dkar mo dang / rku byed ma dang / rab rmongs ma dang / ro langs ma yi'o //
translated: The sharp arrow, the goad, the beer, and the water are, respectively, those of Gaurī, Caurī, Vetālī, and Pukkasi.

original: rlung gis bskyod ma'i lcug ma dang / ras dang / 'bar ba'i me rnams ni rim bzhin du spos byed ma dang / gtum mo dang / sme ma yi'o //
analyzed: rlung gis bskyod ma'i lcug ma dang / ras dang / 'bar ba'i me rnams ni rim bzhin du spos byed ma dang / gtum mo dang / sme ma yi'o //
translated: The moving twigs, cloth, and blazing fire are respectively Dhūpā, Mārajitā, and Jvālamālini.

original: bcom ldan 'das padma gar yig dbang phyug gi ni sna tshogs pa ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das padma gar yig dbang phyug gi ni sna tshogs pa ste /
translated: The Blessed One's are variegated,

original: dmar mo dang / ljang gu dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang le brgan gyi padma'o //🔽rnam par lta ma dang / sgrol ma dang / rgya can ma dang / khro gnyer ma dang / padmo la gnas @86a * //
analyzed: dmar mo dang / ljang gu dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang le brgan gyi padma'o // rnam par lta ma dang / sgrol ma dang / rgya can ma dang / khro gnyer ma dang / padmo la gnas @86a * //
translated: red, green, white, yellow, and pink lotuses.

original: ma dang / sna tshogs padma'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyi rim bzhin du padma'i kar ni ka dang / khu tshur dang / 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dang / mdud rtse gsum pa dang / chu srin gyi rgya mtshan dang / rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnams so //
analyzed: ma dang / sna tshogs padma'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyi rim bzhin du padma'i kar ni ka dang / khu tshur dang / 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dang / mdud rtse gsum pa dang / chu srin gyi rgya mtshan dang / rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnams so //
translated: The emblems of Vīra, Tārā, Pūrṇikā, Bhṛkuṭī, Padmasana, and Viśvapadmavatī are respectively a karṇikā lotus, a fist, an eight-spoked wheel, a three-pointed mace, a crocodile banner, and a five-pronged vajra.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma ni gzhu dang / mda' dang / ral gri dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnams so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma ni gzhu dang / mda' dang / ral gri dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnams so //
translated: The Blessed One Vajrasūrya holds a bow, an arrow, a sword, and a sun maṇḍala.

original: lha mo dbang bskur ma dang / rin po che'i gter dang / rgyal mtshan gyi mchog dang / mchod pa chen po rnams ni rim bzhin du rin po che cod pan dang / gter gyi bum pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / chun 'phyang la sogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis bkang ba'i snod rnams thogs par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: lha mo dbang bskur ma dang / rin po che'i gter dang / rgyal mtshan gyi mchog dang / mchod pa chen po rnams ni rim bzhin du rin po che cod pan dang / gter gyi bum pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / chun 'phyang la sogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis bkang ba'i snod rnams thogs par shes par bya'o //
translated: The goddesses Abhiṣeka, Ratnagarbha, Dhvaja, and Mahāpūjā should be known to hold a jeweled crown, a treasure vase, a victory banner, and a vessel filled with all ornaments such as earrings, respectively.

original: dpal rta mchog gi ni sna tshogs padma dang sna tshogs rdo rje ste /
analyzed: dpal rta mchog gi ni sna tshogs padma dang sna tshogs rdo rje ste /
translated: The glorious Hayagrīva holds a multicolored lotus and a multicolored vajra.

original: phyag rgya rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: phyag rgya rnam pa gnyis so //
translated: These are the two types of mudrās.

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'i rtog pa ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'i rtog pa ste /
translated: This is the chapter on the knowledge of the mudrās of all maṇḍalas.

original: rtog pa bdun pa'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: rtog pa bdun pa'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the seventh chapter.

original: // / mchod pa med par dngos grub mi 'byung bas bcom ldan 'das mchod pa thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba /
analyzed: // / mchod pa med par dngos grub mi 'byung bas bcom ldan 'das mchod pa thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba /
translated: Since siddhis do not arise without worship, the Blessed One is the union of all worship.

original: dpal skal ba bzang po dam tshig gi rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dpal skal ba bzang po dam tshig gi rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the nature of the glorious good fortune pledge,

original: de nas gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “Next, the supreme of all aspects of the various arrays of the glorious Vajrasattva deities,” and so on.

original: de nas gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya shes pa'i 'og tu'o //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya shes pa'i 'og tu'o //
translated: “Next” is after the knowledge of the maṇḍala seal.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lta ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa yin pas /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lta ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa yin pas /
translated: The glorious Vajrasattva deities are Vairocana and so on.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang lha ni rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha ste /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang lha ni rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha ste /
translated: The glorious Vajrasattva deities are the deities of the glorious Vajrasattva.

original: de rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad du kun nas sna tshogs shing ma lus pa mchog tu gyur pas na /
analyzed: de rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad du kun nas sna tshogs shing ma lus pa mchog tu gyur pas na /
translated: Since they are the supreme of all aspects, the various arrays of all of them,

original: rnam pa kun du sna tshogs mchog go //
analyzed: rnam pa kun du sna tshogs mchog go //
translated: they are the supreme of all aspects of the various arrays.

original: mchod pa thams cad ni rnam par sprul pa'o zhes bya ba ni mchod pa thams cad mngon par sprul pa'o //
analyzed: mchod pa thams cad ni rnam par sprul pa'o zhes bya ba ni mchod pa thams cad mngon par sprul pa'o //
translated: “All offerings are emanations” means that all offerings are emanations.

original: de ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa la sogs pa'i yo byad dang / gzhan dag gis mchod pa'i bar du rdzogs par byas la ;
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa la sogs pa'i yo byad dang / gzhan dag gis mchod pa'i bar du rdzogs par byas la ;
translated: Having completed the articles for the assembly in the maṇḍala, and so forth, and having completed the offerings by others,

original: phyag bya ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyag bya ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis bya ba'o //
translated: one should perform the mudras of homage.

original: de'i rim pa yang 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i rim pa yang 'di yin te /
translated: The stages of that are as follows:

original: dpal bde ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i glu dang / rdo rje gar byas la g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur 'gying bag dang bcas pas rdo rje dril bu bzung la /
analyzed: dpal bde ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i glu dang / rdo rje gar byas la g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur 'gying bag dang bcas pas rdo rje dril bu bzung la /
translated: One should sing the song called “Glorious Vajrasattva” and perform the vajra dance, holding the vajra and bell with the left vajra fist, swaying with grace,

original: g-yas pa ba dan gsum par byas te /
analyzed: g-yas pa ba dan gsum par byas te /
translated: and with the right hand making the three-banner mudra.

original: @86b gnas la sri zhur bcas shing bteg pa'i mchog gis mig 'gul ba dang bcas pa'i mgo g-yon du btud la /
analyzed: @86b gnas la sri zhur bcas shing bteg pa'i mchog gis mig 'gul ba dang bcas pa'i mgo g-yon du btud la /
translated: With the head bowed to the left, with the eyes moving,

original: aom a'a di bh'u h'um zhes brjod la bsam pa g-yos pas bdag nyid kyis rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag bya'o //
analyzed: aom a'a di bh'u h'um zhes brjod la bsam pa g-yos pas bdag nyid kyis rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag bya'o //
translated: one should perform homage to oneself as Vajrasattva with the thought wavering, reciting “Oṃ āḥ bhūḥ hūṃ.”

original: khengs pa gzhan dag nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: khengs pa gzhan dag nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the other kinds of arrogance,

original: drag po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: drag po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says “Rudra,” and so on.

original: nye dbang bcas zhes bya ba ni khyab 'jug pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: nye dbang bcas zhes bya ba ni khyab 'jug pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Together with the powerful ones means together with Vishnu.

original: tshangs par bcas zhes bya ba ni skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: tshangs par bcas zhes bya ba ni skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Together with Brahma means together with Prajapati.

original: legs byas nas zhes bya ba ni byas pa'o //
analyzed: legs byas nas zhes bya ba ni byas pa'o //
translated: Having done well means having done.

original: mchog tu gsal ba'i cha shas grangs kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i glu dang gar byas la rdo rje thal mo bskor te /
analyzed: mchog tu gsal ba'i cha shas grangs kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i glu dang gar byas la rdo rje thal mo bskor te /
translated: Having sung the song The supreme clear part, the number, and so on, and having danced, one should circle the vajra palms,

original: aom a'a di bh'u aom /
analyzed: aom a'a di bh'u aom /
translated: and recite Om adibhu om,

original: zhes brjod la bsam pa g-yos pas phyag bya'o //
analyzed: zhes brjod la bsam pa g-yos pas phyag bya'o //
translated: and having shaken the mind, one should prostrate.

original: rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni glu dang rdo rje gar byas la he ru ka'i khu tshur las mthe'u chung mche ba dang 'dra bar khar bzhag la /
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni glu dang rdo rje gar byas la he ru ka'i khu tshur las mthe'u chung mche ba dang 'dra bar khar bzhag la /
translated: Having sung the song The various, and so on, and having danced the vajra dance, one should place the little finger of the Heruka fist in one's mouth like a fang,

original: aom a'a di bh'u ha ha ha ha ha ru lu ru lu h'um /

original: de la chos kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs par bdag nyid bsgrub pas so so'i kha dog dang / 'dug thabs dang / phyag mtshan dang / phyag rgya ji lta ba dang ldan pas /
analyzed: de la chos kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs par bdag nyid bsgrub pas so so'i kha dog dang / 'dug thabs dang / phyag mtshan dang / phyag rgya ji lta ba dang ldan pas /
translated: There, by one’s own accomplishment in the Dharma maṇḍala, etc., endowed with the individual colors, postures, implements, and gestures,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po gzhag la bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po gzhag la bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate, having placed the great seal of Vajrasattva, etc.

original: thams cad 'byung ba phyag rgya zhes pa'i bar du bstan pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: thams cad 'byung ba phyag rgya zhes pa'i bar du bstan pa 'di yin te /
translated: This is taught up to “the seal of the origin of all.”

original: bde ba kun la ni bde ba dang yid bde ba bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba kun la ni bde ba dang yid bde ba bla na med pa'o //
translated: “All bliss” is the unsurpassed bliss and mental bliss.

original: des zhen pa ni dmar pa'o //
analyzed: des zhen pa ni dmar pa'o //
translated: “Passion” is red.

original: de bas na dngos grub thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de bas na dngos grub thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir te /
translated: Therefore, because all powers are pure,

original: byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: the thought of awakening is pure.🔽By those two causes, he is like a full moon, and his body is red.

original: rgyu de gnyis @88b kyis na zla ba yongs su rdzogs pa lta bu dang / sku rtsa dmar ba'o gdul bya thams cad la chags pa ni /
analyzed: rgyu de gnyis @88b kyis na zla ba yongs su rdzogs pa lta bu dang / sku rtsa dmar ba'o gdul bya thams cad la chags pa ni /
translated: Attachment to all those to be trained is

original: 'dod chags kun te /
analyzed: 'dod chags kun te /
translated: all passion.

original: thugs rje chen po'i des rjes su chags shing dga' bar byed la /
analyzed: thugs rje chen po'i des rjes su chags shing dga' bar byed la /
translated: By that great compassion, he is passionate and delights them.

original: rgyu des na dmar po sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od de /
analyzed: rgyu des na dmar po sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od de /
translated: By that cause, he is red, and his light🔽is blazing in many ways.

original: kha dog dmar ba'i ri mo du mas rnam pa sna tshogs su 'bar ba'i 'od gang la yod pa'i tshig gis mtshams sbyar te /
analyzed: kha dog dmar ba'i ri mo du mas rnam pa sna tshogs su 'bar ba'i 'od gang la yod pa'i tshig gis mtshams sbyar te /
translated: The light that has many red lines blazing in many ways is connected by the word “having.”

original: dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / sngon po dang / ser po dang / dkar po rnams nang du rdul phran bzhin du mchog tu 'bar bar gyur pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//
analyzed: dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / sngon po dang / ser po dang / dkar po rnams nang du rdul phran bzhin du mchog tu 'bar bar gyur pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//
translated: Red, green, blue, yellow, and white become like atoms, and they become the supreme blazing light up to “the red light mandala.”

original: sangs rgyas rin chen ni thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin chen ni thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The jewel of the Buddha is endowed with the diadem of the five Buddhas, who are the best of all.

original: gzhan gyi nor min zhes pa ni gzhan la med pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi nor min zhes pa ni gzhan la med pa'o //
translated: Not the wealth of others means that it is not the wealth of others.

original: lha yi chu ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
analyzed: lha yi chu ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
translated: The water of the gods is the intuition of emptiness.

original: des dag pa'o //
analyzed: des dag pa'o //
translated: It is purified by that.

original: mthu dang zhes bya ba ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi che ba'i bdag nyid kyis so //
analyzed: mthu dang zhes bya ba ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi che ba'i bdag nyid kyis so //
translated: Power means the greatness of the nature of merit and intuition.

original: ngo bo dag ni rang gi lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bdag nyid kyi smon lam gyi bar gyis so //🔽rang bzhin gyis ni de grub pa'o zhes bya ba ni lhun gyis yongs su grub pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo dag ni rang gi lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bdag nyid kyi smon lam gyi bar gyis so // rang bzhin gyis ni de grub pa'o zhes bya ba ni lhun gyis yongs su grub pa'o //
translated: The essence is the vow of one's own superior intention.

original: rgya des na /
analyzed: rgya des na /
translated: It is naturally accomplished by that, which means that it is spontaneously and perfectly accomplished.

original: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi gtsug gi nor bu dang / kha tv'am ga yang sems can rnams gdul ba la dbang bas kun nas nyon mongs 'jig rten dbang phyug ste /
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi gtsug gi nor bu dang / kha tv'am ga yang sems can rnams gdul ba la dbang bas kun nas nyon mongs 'jig rten dbang phyug ste /
translated: By that seal, the diadem of skulls means that the Buddha is the Lord of the world of the afflictions, because he has power over the taming of sentient beings with the skull diadem, the crest jewel of the Buddha, and the khaṭvāṅga.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dbang du byed pa grub ba mo dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang yang dag par sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dbang du byed pa grub ba mo dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang yang dag par sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba ste /
translated: The one who is united with glorious Vajrasattva, who is the accomplishment of the mastery of the world of afflictions, is the union of glorious Vajrasattva.

original: sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor bas gnas pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor bas gnas pa'o //
translated: He abides in union and post-union.

original: lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yi //
analyzed: lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yi //
translated: The union with all goddesses

original: zhes pa ni shin tu sbyor ba bstan par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni shin tu sbyor ba bstan par gyur pa ste /
translated: is taught to be the supreme union.

original: de nyid kyis na kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po'o //
translated: By that alone, he is the one with the good fortune of the variety of all.

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad grub //🔽ces pa ni /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad grub // ces pa ni /
translated: He is the accomplishment of all dakinis.

original: rnal 'byor thams cad kyi bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu grub pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor thams cad kyi bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu grub pa'o //
translated: He is the accomplishment of Vajrasattva, the nature of all yogas.

original: rgyas btab pa ni rgyas 'debs ma'o //
analyzed: rgyas btab pa ni rgyas 'debs ma'o //
translated: The seal is the seal-impression.

original: rmongs par byas pa ni rmongs byed mas so //
analyzed: rmongs par byas pa ni rmongs byed mas so //
translated: The stupefied is the stupefier.

original: bslang ba ni tshe 'phel mas so //
analyzed: bslang ba ni tshe 'phel mas so //
translated: The raised is the life-increasing.

original: phyag rgya 'di yis zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgyas so //
analyzed: phyag rgya 'di yis zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgyas so //
translated: By this seal, by the seal of Vajrasattva.

original: rab tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba ni sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid kyis @89a * //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba ni sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid kyis @89a * //
translated: The application to the highest joy is the application to the highest joy through the characteristic of application and subsequent application.

original: shin tu sbyor bas mchog tu dga' ba la rjes su sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: shin tu sbyor bas mchog tu dga' ba la rjes su sbyor ba'o //
translated: Through the supreme application, there is the subsequent application to the highest joy.

original: des bdag nyid bsgrubs pas skal pa bzang por gyur pa dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang / bde ba'i mchog gang yin pa'i bde ba'i mthar thug par gyur pa ni rol pa rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: des bdag nyid bsgrubs pas skal pa bzang por gyur pa dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang / bde ba'i mchog gang yin pa'i bde ba'i mthar thug par gyur pa ni rol pa rdzogs pa'o //
translated: Through that, one accomplishes oneself, and becomes fortunate, with the nature of glorious Vajrasattva, and the supreme bliss, which is the ultimate bliss, is the complete enjoyment.

original: g-yas dang g-yon gyi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: g-yas dang g-yon gyi sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the union of the right and left,

original: zhes pa ni rkang pa g-yas pas rkang pa g-yon pa mnan pa'i sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni rkang pa g-yas pas rkang pa g-yon pa mnan pa'i sbyor ba ste /
translated: the union of the right foot on the left foot.

original: des bde ba'i cha lugs de ci lta ba bde bar ro //
analyzed: des bde ba'i cha lugs de ci lta ba bde bar ro //
translated: By that, one enjoys the mode of bliss just as it is.

original: da ni bde ba'i mchog la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po rnams bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni bde ba'i mchog la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po rnams bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the great seal of supreme bliss and so forth,

original: zla ba'i kha dog ces bya ba la sogs pa //
analyzed: zla ba'i kha dog ces bya ba la sogs pa //
translated: it is said, “the color of the moon,” and so on.

original: gsungs te / zla ba'i kha dog 'dzum pa ni gang gi zhal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu yod pa ni zla ba'i kha dog 'dzum pa'i zhal lo //🔽dngos grub thams cad dag pa dang // zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gsungs te / zla ba'i kha dog 'dzum pa ni gang gi zhal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu yod pa ni zla ba'i kha dog 'dzum pa'i zhal lo // dngos grub thams cad dag pa dang // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The face with the smile of the moon's color is the face that has a moon-disk.

original: byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa'o //🔽thugs rje chen po rnam par dag pas kyang brla'i dbus na dmar la dkar ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa'o // thugs rje chen po rnam par dag pas kyang brla'i dbus na dmar la dkar ba'o //
translated: The purity of all powers is the purity of the Thought of Enlightenment.

original: phyag mchog lo ma sngon po 'dra //🔽zhes pa ni phyag dang mchog yin la /🔽lo ma dang sngon po ni lo ma sngon pho ste /
analyzed: phyag mchog lo ma sngon po 'dra // zhes pa ni phyag dang mchog yin la / lo ma dang sngon po ni lo ma sngon pho ste /
translated: The middle of the thigh is red and white by the purity of great compassion.🔽The hand is the best, like a blue leaf.

original: rim bzhin du phyag dang mchog lo ma dang sngon po 'dra ba de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: rim bzhin du phyag dang mchog lo ma dang sngon po 'dra ba de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: The hand is the best, and the leaf is blue, so it is called the blue leaf.

original: phyag gi mdog ni sngo la rtse mo ni lo ma'i mdog can no zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: phyag gi mdog ni sngo la rtse mo ni lo ma'i mdog can no zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: The color of the hand is blue, and the tip is the color of a leaf.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: de bzhin bde ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin bde ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ba ste /
translated: The lord of bliss is so called.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i dbang phyug la dbang thob pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i dbang phyug la dbang thob pa'o //
translated: He has attained mastery over the bliss of Vajrasattva.

original: de nyid kyi bde ba bskyed pa'i reg pa ni bde ba'i reg pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi bde ba bskyed pa'i reg pa ni bde ba'i reg pa ste /
translated: The touch that generates that bliss is the touch of bliss.

original: 'di la dbang thob pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la dbang thob pa'o //
translated: He has attained mastery over that.🔽His thighs are white and yellow,

original: dkar zhing ser ba'i brla dang zhes pa ni 'og tu mdog dkar ba nyid do //
analyzed: dkar zhing ser ba'i brla dang zhes pa ni 'og tu mdog dkar ba nyid do //
translated: that is, they are white below.

original: de nyid ni lha rdzas sna tshogs kha dog ste kha dog lnga pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni lha rdzas sna tshogs kha dog ste kha dog lnga pa'o //
translated: That itself is the various divine colors, that is, the five colors.

original: kha dog dkar po la sogs pa ji skad bstan pa rnams lha mo bzhi po de rnams kyi so so yin par shes par bya ba'am zhe na /
analyzed: kha dog dkar po la sogs pa ji skad bstan pa rnams lha mo bzhi po de rnams kyi so so yin par shes par bya ba'am zhe na /
translated: Should the white color and so forth that are taught be understood as belonging to each of those four goddesses?

original: de dag ni spyir yan lag thams cad kyi sgo nas kha dog la sogs pa bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag ni spyir yan lag thams cad kyi sgo nas kha dog la sogs pa bstan pa yin no //
translated: In general, they are taught as the color and so forth of all the limbs.

original: 'bar ba sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od //🔽ces pa ni /
analyzed: 'bar ba sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od // ces pa ni /
translated: Blazing with various blazing lights.

original: 'bar ba sna tshogs pa rnams kyis kun du 'khrugs pa'i 'od dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'bar ba sna tshogs pa rnams kyis kun du 'khrugs pa'i 'od dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He who is endowed with a light that is agitated by various flames is so-called.

original: padmo sna tshogs la gnas pas //
analyzed: padmo sna tshogs la gnas pas //
translated: Residing on various lotuses.

original: zhes pa ni stan gang yin pa de ni sna tshogs @89b padma la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni stan gang yin pa de ni sna tshogs @89b padma la gnas pa'o //
translated: This is the seat, which is located on a variegated lotus.

original: thams cad dag par rab tu gnas //
analyzed: thams cad dag par rab tu gnas //
translated: All are pure, well-established.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This is the meaning:

original: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa la dmigs pa'i ye shes thams cad dag pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa la dmigs pa'i ye shes thams cad dag pa ste /
translated: All wisdoms that observe all phenomena as pure by nature are pure.

original: don dam par de'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na thams cad dag pa la rab tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: don dam par de'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na thams cad dag pa la rab tu gnas pa'o //
translated: Since they are of the nature of that [wisdom] ultimately, they are well-established in all purity.

original: yang na thams cad dag par rab tu gnas pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: yang na thams cad dag par rab tu gnas pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
translated: Or, all are pure, well-established, which is Vajrasattva.

original: de rab tu gnas pa ni de dang 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: de rab tu gnas pa ni de dang 'brel pa'o //
translated: Well-established in that is connected with that.

original: sangs rgyas te zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas gcig gis dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas te zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas gcig gis dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: Buddha is the empowerment conferred by one buddha.

original: padma zhes bya ba ni thod pa gcig gis dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: padma zhes bya ba ni thod pa gcig gis dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: Lotus is the empowerment conferred by one skull-cup.

original: de la sogs pa'i rin po che mchog la sogs pa'i gang yin pa de rnams la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: de la sogs pa'i rin po che mchog la sogs pa'i gang yin pa de rnams la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: Those who have such and so forth are called supreme jewel and so forth.

original: sangs rgyas dang padma la sogs pa'i rin po che mchog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang gos yod pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang padma la sogs pa'i rin po che mchog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang gos yod pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The ornaments and garments of various kinds of supreme jewels such as Buddhas, lotuses, and so forth.

original: sangs rgyas padma la sogs mchog //
analyzed: sangs rgyas padma la sogs mchog //
translated: The supreme Buddhas, lotuses, and so forth,

original: rin chen padma rgyan dang gos //
analyzed: rin chen padma rgyan dang gos //
translated: are the ornaments and garments of jewels and lotuses.

original: zhes bya'o // sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yi //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yi //
translated: The assembly of all Buddhas

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This is the meaning of the following:🔽

original: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus par gyur pa ste /
translated: the assembly of all Buddhas.

original: des mi mjed la sogs pa kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan bzhin du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: des mi mjed la sogs pa kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan bzhin du gyur pa'o //
translated: By that, the defiled world systems such as the Saha world become like ornaments.

original: bya ba dang ni zhes pa ni 'dir lhod par 'dzin par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba dang ni zhes pa ni 'dir lhod par 'dzin par gyur pa'o //
translated: The action is here the holding of the bow.

original: zlog pa ni rang gi snying gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis gzhu bzung nas bde ba dang yid bde ba la sogs pas mnyam pa dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs zlog pa'o //
analyzed: zlog pa ni rang gi snying gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis gzhu bzung nas bde ba dang yid bde ba la sogs pas mnyam pa dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs zlog pa'o //
translated: The reversal is the holding of the bow in the manner of drawing it to one's heart, reversing the discordant side with bliss, mental pleasure, and so forth.

original: 'phrog ma ni lag pa g-yas pa brkyang zhing g-yon pa bskum pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'phrog ma ni lag pa g-yas pa brkyang zhing g-yon pa bskum pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The snatching is the extending of the right hand, the bending of the left hand, and so forth.

original: bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis //
analyzed: bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis //
translated: The consort embracing him

original: zhes pa ni g-yon 'gying bas so //🔽yan lag thams cad 'phrog pa ni //
analyzed: zhes pa ni g-yon 'gying bas so // yan lag thams cad 'phrog pa ni //
translated: means with a leftward grace.🔽Stealing all the limbs

original: yan lag thams cad kyi bya ba'o //
analyzed: yan lag thams cad kyi bya ba'o //
translated: means the activity of all the limbs.

original: grub pa ni rab tu grub pa ste mkhas pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: grub pa ni rab tu grub pa ste mkhas pa'i bar du'o //
translated: Accomplishment is complete success, up to expertise.

original: 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
translated: This is what is taught.

original: bya ba la sogs pa la mkhas par spyod pas g-yon pa 'gying bas gzhu bzung la /
analyzed: bya ba la sogs pa la mkhas par spyod pas g-yon pa 'gying bas gzhu bzung la /
translated: By engaging in expertise in action and so forth, with a leftward grace take up the bow,

original: lag pa g-yas pas mda' 'dren pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa'o //
analyzed: lag pa g-yas pas mda' 'dren pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa'o //
translated: and with the right hand draw the arrow as if in the manner of shooting.

original: mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor bas skal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la bde ba'i mchog gi mda' dang gzhus bde ba'i mchog gi mthar thug par byas pa ni rol pa zhes bya ba'o //🔽ai ma'o bde ba'i phyag rgya chen po bstan @90a * //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor bas skal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la bde ba'i mchog gi mda' dang gzhus bde ba'i mchog gi mthar thug par byas pa ni rol pa zhes bya ba'o // ai ma'o bde ba'i phyag rgya chen po bstan @90a * //
translated: By applying yourself to supreme joy, with the supreme bliss of the bow and arrow of supreme bliss, you should reach the culmination of supreme bliss. This is called “play.”

original: pa'i phyir / rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: pa'i phyir / rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to demonstrate the great seal of bliss, he says various forms, and so on.

original: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig ni sprul pa sna tshogs pas mtshan pa gang yin pa rdo rje sems dpa' de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig ni sprul pa sna tshogs pas mtshan pa gang yin pa rdo rje sems dpa' de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: He is called the “pledge of various aspects” because he is marked with various emanations.

original: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig la zhen pas chags par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig la zhen pas chags par gyur pa'o //
translated: He is “attached to the pledge of various aspects” because he is attached to the various aspects of the pledge.

original: bde ba des na de la 'bab cing gzhan gyi rgyud de la rab tu 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba des na de la 'bab cing gzhan gyi rgyud de la rab tu 'jug pa'o //
translated: “By that bliss” means that he is engaged in that continuum of another.

original: bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya ni g-yon 'gying ba ste /
analyzed: bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya ni g-yon 'gying ba ste /
translated: The “mudra embracing him” is the one who is languid on the left.

original: de nyid mchog yin pas gang gi dbus kyi lha mchog chen po de la 'khyud nas gnas pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid mchog yin pas gang gi dbus kyi lha mchog chen po de la 'khyud nas gnas pa ni /

original: tshig snga ma'i /
