translated: This means that one should dance with play and bind oneself in the great seal just as it is in the mandala of Vajrasattva.

original: glu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: glu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the song,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said, “Vajrasattva,” and so on.

original: kye rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bde ba dang / yid bde ba'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' khyod dang bdag ni gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo nyid las gyur pas bdag gi phyir mngon du gyur par bsgrubs la rtogs shing khong du chud par mdzad du gsol zhes pa'o //
analyzed: kye rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bde ba dang / yid bde ba'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' khyod dang bdag ni gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo nyid las gyur pas bdag gi phyir mngon du gyur par bsgrubs la rtogs shing khong du chud par mdzad du gsol zhes pa'o //
translated: O you, glorious Vajrasattva, who are of the nature of uninterrupted bliss and mental joy, and I, who am of the nature of non-duality with you, I pray that you accomplish, realize, and understand for my sake.

original: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs pa ni sprul ba sna tshogs pa ste /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs pa ni sprul ba sna tshogs pa ste /
translated: The various magical dakinis are the various emanations.

original: des 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul ba'i mchog //
analyzed: des 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul ba'i mchog //
translated: By them, the various dispositions of beings are the supreme to be disciplined.

original: grub pa bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol //
analyzed: grub pa bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol //
translated: Please accomplish the accomplishment for me.

original: zhes pa ni bde ba mchog gi ngo bos so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bde ba mchog gi ngo bos so //
translated: This is in the nature of supreme bliss.

original: mngon du mdzod cig ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: mngon du mdzod cig ces bya ba ni /
translated: Please manifest, he says.

original: kye bde ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis so //
analyzed: kye bde ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis so //
translated: O, by the nature of bliss.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi ngo bo nyid kyi bde ba ni byang chub kun gyi bde ba chen po'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi ngo bo nyid kyi bde ba ni byang chub kun gyi bde ba chen po'o //
translated: The nature of all tathagatas is bliss, which is the great bliss of all enlightenments.

original: de'i bdag nyid kyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma ni sgrol ma'i sprul pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma ni sgrol ma'i sprul pa'o //
translated: The magical dakini who is of that nature is the emanation of Tara.

original: de nyid sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog ste /
analyzed: de nyid sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog ste /
translated: That is the supreme bliss of variety.

original: sgrol ma'i ngo bo nyid kyi don rnams grub par mdzod cig ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgrol ma'i ngo bo nyid kyi don rnams grub par mdzod cig ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “Tara” is to accomplish the aims.

original: aa la la la la ho zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gar rnams mdzad du gsol zhes pa ste /
analyzed: aa la la la la ho zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gar rnams mdzad du gsol zhes pa ste /
translated: “ A la la la la ho” and so forth means “Please perform the various dances of the Tathagatas.”

original: shi shi'i sprul par rab tu ston cig ces bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: shi shi'i sprul par rab tu ston cig ces bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: “ Shi shi” is to be applied as “Please manifest emanations.”

original: dza:h'um bam ho:/ zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dza:h'um bam ho:/ zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “ JAH HUM BAM HOH”

original: rim bzhin du bde mchog dang sgrol ma la sogs pa rnams kyi nye bar bskul ba ste /🔽zung la rnam par sprul zhes pas kyang bde mchog dang / kye ma bde ba @92a * //
analyzed: rim bzhin du bde mchog dang sgrol ma la sogs pa rnams kyi nye bar bskul ba ste / zung la rnam par sprul zhes pas kyang bde mchog dang / kye ma bde ba @92a * //
translated: is the invocation of Chakrasamvara, Tara, and so forth, respectively.

original: mchog gi rim bzhin du bskul ba'o //🔽h'um snang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba ni sgrol ma'i 'o //
analyzed: mchog gi rim bzhin du bskul ba'o // h'um snang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba ni sgrol ma'i 'o //
translated: “ Embrace and emanate” also invokes Chakrasamvara, and “O bliss supreme” invokes Tara.🔽“ HUM illuminate” is Tara’s.

original: slob ma gzung du gsol zhes pa ni shi shi yi'o //
analyzed: slob ma gzung du gsol zhes pa ni shi shi yi'o //
translated: “ Please accept the disciple” is Shi Shi’s.

original: de bzhin gshegs kun sna tshogs mkha' 'gro sgyu ma zhes bya ba ni lha mo lhag ma rnams kyis so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs kun sna tshogs mkha' 'gro sgyu ma zhes bya ba ni lha mo lhag ma rnams kyis so //
translated: The illusion of the dakinis of all the tathagatas is the remaining goddesses.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'byung ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'byung ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate the origin of Vairochana,

original: rnal 'byor de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares the reality of yoga, etc.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: The reality is Vajrasattva.

original: thar pa thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa ste /
analyzed: thar pa thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa ste /
translated: All liberations are mundane and supramundane,

original: srid pa las nges par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: srid pa las nges par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: having the characteristic of emerging from existence.

original: de'i rnam par dag pa ni gang zag dang chos la bdag med par khong du chud pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rnam par dag pa ni gang zag dang chos la bdag med par khong du chud pa'o //
translated: Its purity is the realization of the selflessness of persons and phenomena.

original: de rdzogs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya la rab tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de rdzogs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya la rab tu gnas pa'o //
translated: Its perfection is the firm establishment of the buddha-seal.

original: don dam pa ni chos kyi dbyings te /
analyzed: don dam pa ni chos kyi dbyings te /
translated: The ultimate is the dharma-dhātu,

original: de ni rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is pure.

original: chags med ni nye bar dmigs pa thams cad kyi phyir phyogs pa'o //
analyzed: chags med ni nye bar dmigs pa thams cad kyi phyir phyogs pa'o //
translated: The unattached is the orientation toward all objective references.

original: sogs pa'i sgra ni zhe sdang dang bral ba dang / khong khro bas ma bcos pa dang / dngos po rnams la rjes su chags pa mi dmigs pa dang / gti mug dang bral ba ste /
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgra ni zhe sdang dang bral ba dang / khong khro bas ma bcos pa dang / dngos po rnams la rjes su chags pa mi dmigs pa dang / gti mug dang bral ba ste /
translated: The words “and so on” refer to being free from hatred, not being distorted by anger, not observing the attachment to things, and being free from delusion.

original: bdag la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa spangs ba'o //🔽gang chags pa med pa la sogs pa dang / chags pa chen po dang ldan pa de dag ni /
analyzed: bdag la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa spangs ba'o // gang chags pa med pa la sogs pa dang / chags pa chen po dang ldan pa de dag ni /
translated: They are free from the discriminations of self and so on.🔽Those who are free from attachment and so on, and who have great attachment,

original: chags med la sogs chags chen phyir te /
analyzed: chags med la sogs chags chen phyir te /
translated: are free from attachment and so on, and have great attachment.

original: de dag gis ni chags pa med pa la sogs pas ni dkar ba yin la /
analyzed: de dag gis ni chags pa med pa la sogs pas ni dkar ba yin la /
translated: They are white because they are free from attachment and so on.

original: chags pa chen po ste /
analyzed: chags pa chen po ste /
translated: They have great attachment,

original: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas na sna tshogs gsal ba'i mdangs can no //
analyzed: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas na sna tshogs gsal ba'i mdangs can no //
translated: because they have great compassion, they have a radiant luster.

original: rin chen chos ni chos kyi bdag nyid can gyi rin po che'o //
analyzed: rin chen chos ni chos kyi bdag nyid can gyi rin po che'o //
translated: The jewel of the Dharma is a jewel that has the nature of the Dharma.

original: de las lhag pa ni gzhan pa'o //🔽byang chub kyi sems ni byang chub kyi bdag nyid can gyi sems te /
analyzed: de las lhag pa ni gzhan pa'o // byang chub kyi sems ni byang chub kyi bdag nyid can gyi sems te /
translated: It is superior to that,🔽the mind of enlightenment is the mind that has the nature of enlightenment,

original: byang chub la 'jug pa'i sems so //
analyzed: byang chub la 'jug pa'i sems so //
translated: the mind that enters into enlightenment.

original: de'i don theg pa chen po ston pa'i bdag nyid can gyi chos te /
analyzed: de'i don theg pa chen po ston pa'i bdag nyid can gyi chos te /
translated: The meaning of that is the Dharma which has the nature of teaching the Great Vehicle.

original: de nyid ni rdo rje rin chen no //
analyzed: de nyid ni rdo rje rin chen no //
translated: That itself is the vajra jewel.

original: de 'di la yod pas na /
analyzed: de 'di la yod pas na /
translated: Since it exists here,

original: de bas theg chen byang chub sems //
analyzed: de bas theg chen byang chub sems //
translated: therefore the Great Vehicle is the enlightenment mind.

original: rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen can //
analyzed: rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen can //
translated: The Victor is the one who has the vajra jewel.

original: zhes bya'o // bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po ni /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po ni /
translated: The great seal of the Blessed One is

original: g-yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pas g-yas pa'i mthe bong dang / mdzub mo gnyis kyis sor mo thams cad la reg pa'o //🔽shes rab pha rol phyin gsal @92b zhing ;
analyzed: g-yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pas g-yas pa'i mthe bong dang / mdzub mo gnyis kyis sor mo thams cad la reg pa'o // shes rab pha rol phyin gsal @92b zhing ;
translated: the left hand in a fist, and the right thumb and forefinger touching all the fingers.

original: / zhes pa 'dis ni de nyid ston te /
analyzed: / zhes pa 'dis ni de nyid ston te /
translated: This shows that very thing.

original: phyag rgya 'dis ni phung po lnga dang / rigs lnga ma lus par bdag med par ston pa yin no //
analyzed: phyag rgya 'dis ni phung po lnga dang / rigs lnga ma lus par bdag med par ston pa yin no //
translated: This seal shows that all the five aggregates and the five families are selfless.

original: g-yas pa'i yan lag ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras ni skyil mo krung bcas pa'i tshul bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i yan lag ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras ni skyil mo krung bcas pa'i tshul bstan pa yin no //
translated: The words “right limb” and so on show the posture of sitting cross-legged.

original: rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nas ni //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nas ni //
translated: Holding the vajra fist,

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: this is said.

original: sangs rgyas kun brjod ma'i phyag rgya chen po yin te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun brjod ma'i phyag rgya chen po yin te /
translated: This is the great seal of all buddhas.

original: lag pa g-yas pa'i mthe bong nang du bcug ste /🔽srin lag gi rtsar mthe bong gi ltos rtse mo mnan pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la /
analyzed: lag pa g-yas pa'i mthe bong nang du bcug ste / srin lag gi rtsar mthe bong gi ltos rtse mo mnan pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la /
translated: Place the right hand with the thumb inside,🔽and press the tip of the thumb on the side of the ring finger.

original: lag pa g-yon pas steng nas g-yogs shing dgab pa'o //🔽gzhan dag na re sangs rgyas kun brjod ma la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pas steng nas g-yogs shing dgab pa'o // gzhan dag na re sangs rgyas kun brjod ma la sogs pa ni /
translated: Make a vajra fist, and cover it with the left hand.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gos dri ma med pas bkab ste /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gos dri ma med pas bkab ste /
translated: Others say that the seal of all buddhas is made with a vajra fist covered with a pure cloth.

original: phyag rgya bcings la gzung ngo zhes zer ro //
analyzed: phyag rgya bcings la gzung ngo zhes zer ro //
translated: Make the seal and hold it.

original: rdo rje khu tshur de nyid las mthe'u chung brkyang pa ni he ru ka'i phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur de nyid las mthe'u chung brkyang pa ni he ru ka'i phyag rgya ste /
translated: The same vajra fist with the little finger extended is the seal of Heruka.

original: de la lag pa g-yas pas byas la g-yogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de la lag pa g-yas pas byas la g-yogs par bya'o //
translated: Make it with the right hand and cover it with the left.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yon pa de ltar byas pa ni shin tu rgyal mo yi'o //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yon pa de ltar byas pa ni shin tu rgyal mo yi'o //
translated: The same is done with the left hand, which is the seal of Ucchusma.

original: padma'i bud med khu tshur ni //
analyzed: padma'i bud med khu tshur ni //
translated: The lotus woman vajra fist

original: zhes bya ba ni khu tshur bcangs pa la gung mo dang / mdzub mo dang / mthe bo'i rtse mo sbyar bar byas pa ni padma'i khu tshur te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni khu tshur bcangs pa la gung mo dang / mdzub mo dang / mthe bo'i rtse mo sbyar bar byas pa ni padma'i khu tshur te /
translated: This is the lotus fist, with the middle finger, index finger, and thumb tips joined.

original: lag pa g-yas pas byas la g-yon pas dgab pa ni kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: lag pa g-yas pas byas la g-yon pas dgab pa ni kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: Made with the right hand and covered by the left, it is the mudra of Samantabhadra.

original: rin chen mdzes pa'i khu tshur yang //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rin chen mdzes pa'i khu tshur yang // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The beautiful jewel fist🔽is made with the right hand.

original: khu tshur byas la rtse mo sbyar bar byas pa ni /🔽rin po che'i khu tshur te /
analyzed: khu tshur byas la rtse mo sbyar bar byas pa ni / rin po che'i khu tshur te /
translated: This is the jewel fist, with the tips joined.

original: lag pa g-yas pas bcings la lag pa g-yon pas dgab pa ni mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: lag pa g-yas pas bcings la lag pa g-yon pas dgab pa ni mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: Bound with the right hand and covered by the left, it is the mudra of the inexhaustible casket.

original: sangs rgyas khu tshur bcings nas su //
analyzed: sangs rgyas khu tshur bcings nas su //
translated: The Buddha fist is made

original: zhes bya ba ni /🔽mthe bo'i steng du sor mo thams cad kyi rtse mo gzhag pa la lag pa g-yas pas byas la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni / mthe bo'i steng du sor mo thams cad kyi rtse mo gzhag pa la lag pa g-yas pas byas la /
translated: with the right hand.🔽This is the mudra of all the buddhas, with all the tips of the fingers placed on top of the thumbs.

original: g-yon pas dgab pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang ldan ma'i'o //
analyzed: g-yon pas dgab pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang ldan ma'i'o //
translated: Bound with the right hand and covered by the left, it is the mudra of all the buddhas, endowed with all the limbs.

original: gzhan dag na re 'dir snying gar sangs rgyas gzhag pa dang / dpung pa gnyis su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpung rgyan can /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re 'dir snying gar sangs rgyas gzhag pa dang / dpung pa gnyis su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpung rgyan can /
translated: Others say that here, the Buddha is placed at the heart, and the armlets are the perfect Buddha.

original: mgrin par sangs rgyas gtso bo 'jog pa mgul rgyan dang / do shal dang / mgo thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs yod pa /
analyzed: mgrin par sangs rgyas gtso bo 'jog pa mgul rgyan dang / do shal dang / mgo thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs yod pa /
translated: The Buddha is placed at the throat, the chief Buddha, as a necklace, and there is a Buddha image on the head.

original: lag pa g-yas pas sangs rgyas 'dzin pas byin gyis brlabs pas na /
analyzed: lag pa g-yas pas sangs rgyas 'dzin pas byin gyis brlabs pas na /
translated: Since the right hand holds the Buddha, it is blessed.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan @93a * //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan @93a * //
translated: It is called the “possessor of all the limbs of the Buddha.”

original: lag dang ldan ma zhes bya'o zhes man ngag las bshad do //
analyzed: lag dang ldan ma zhes bya'o zhes man ngag las bshad do //
translated: This is explained in the oral tradition.

original: bud med phyag rgya bcings nas su //
analyzed: bud med phyag rgya bcings nas su //
translated: The female mudra is bound,

original: zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur bcings la lag pa g-yon pas dgab pa ni zhal bzangs ma'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur bcings la lag pa g-yon pas dgab pa ni zhal bzangs ma'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: the right hand is clenched into a fist, and the left hand covers it. This is the mudra of Subhaganî.

original: la la na re lag pa g-yon pa'i khu tshur rang gi snying gar bstod pa'i tshul ni bud med kyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: la la na re lag pa g-yon pa'i khu tshur rang gi snying gar bstod pa'i tshul ni bud med kyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: Some say that the left hand is clenched into a fist at the heart, and the manner of praise is the female mudra.

original: de 'dzin pa la lag pa g-yon pas me long bzung ste /
analyzed: de 'dzin pa la lag pa g-yon pas me long bzung ste /
translated: To hold it, one should hold a mirror with the left hand.

original: dga' bas rang gi rang bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan blta bas gnas pa'o //
analyzed: dga' bas rang gi rang bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan blta bas gnas pa'o //
translated: One should stand looking at one's own reflection with joy.

original: de bas na zhal bzangs ma zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de bas na zhal bzangs ma zhes zer ro //
translated: Therefore, it is called the face of the good.

original: sor mo thams cad kyis mthe bo bsdus pa ni rta mchog gi khu tshur te /
analyzed: sor mo thams cad kyis mthe bo bsdus pa ni rta mchog gi khu tshur te /
translated: The supreme horse fist is all the fingers folded in on the thumb.

original: de lag pa g-yon pas bkag pa ni sprin chen mo'i phyag rgya'o //🔽khu tshur bcangs nas mdzub mo dang mthe bong gnyis mig gi rnam par byas pa ni grub pa'i spyan gyi khu tshur te /
analyzed: de lag pa g-yon pas bkag pa ni sprin chen mo'i phyag rgya'o // khu tshur bcangs nas mdzub mo dang mthe bong gnyis mig gi rnam par byas pa ni grub pa'i spyan gyi khu tshur te /
translated: The seal of Mahāmegha is that, with the left hand, one covers it.🔽The fist of the eye of accomplishment is the fist with the index finger and thumb in the form of eyes.

original: lag pa g-yas pas bcings la g-yon pas bkab pa ni nam mkha'i spyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: lag pa g-yas pas bcings la g-yon pas bkab pa ni nam mkha'i spyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The seal of the eye of space is that, with the right hand, one binds it and covers it with the left.

original: khu tshur de dag thams cad kyang rang gi mtshan ma nang du 'dzin par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: khu tshur de dag thams cad kyang rang gi mtshan ma nang du 'dzin par blta bar bya'o //
translated: All those fists should be seen as holding one's own sign in the inside.

original: de dag gi sku mdog ni go rims bzhin du shel dang / gser dang / padma dmar po dang / sna tshogs pa dang / gur gum dang / me long gi mdog dang / bee d'ur+ya dang / ser po rnams so //
analyzed: de dag gi sku mdog ni go rims bzhin du shel dang / gser dang / padma dmar po dang / sna tshogs pa dang / gur gum dang / me long gi mdog dang / bee d'ur+ya dang / ser po rnams so //
translated: Their colors are, respectively, crystal, gold, red lotus, variegated, saffron, mirror, beryl, and yellow.

original: gling bu la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du bshad pas /
analyzed: gling bu la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du bshad pas /
translated: The great mudras such as the flute are explained in the mandala of Vajrasattva.

original: 'di dang dkyil 'khor gzhan dag tu yang rang gi lha lhag ma ji lta ba bzhin du der yang de nyid kyi phyag rgya chen po rnams kyang blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dang dkyil 'khor gzhan dag tu yang rang gi lha lhag ma ji lta ba bzhin du der yang de nyid kyi phyag rgya chen po rnams kyang blta bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, in this and other mandalas, the remaining deities should be seen as the great mudras of their respective deities.

original: phyag rgya shes pa ni bshad ma thag pa'i phyag rgya chen po shes pa'o ;
analyzed: phyag rgya shes pa ni bshad ma thag pa'i phyag rgya chen po shes pa'o ;
translated: The knowledge of mudra is the knowledge of the great mudras just explained.

original: / sangs rgyas sprul pa'i klu mchog ni //
analyzed: / sangs rgyas sprul pa'i klu mchog ni //
translated: The supreme naga emanation of the Buddha

original: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i glu'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i glu'o //
translated: is the song of the origin of the Tathagata.

original: glu 'di dag nyid rim bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: glu 'di dag nyid rim bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach just these songs in sequence,

original: slong bar byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: slong bar byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says “the one who causes to arise,” and so on.

translated: Here, first, having performed the dance with swaying, all those great seals should be bound.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams mang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab kyi grangs snyed khyab pa'i sku'i tshogs dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la ni de skad ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams mang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab kyi grangs snyed khyab pa'i sku'i tshogs dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la ni de skad ces bya ba ste /
translated: As for pervading many world systems, and so on, it is called that which possesses a body collection pervading as many world systems as the number of atoms.

original: de rnams kyi rgyal ba'i don thams cad la rab tu 'jug cing /
analyzed: de rnams kyi rgyal ba'i don thams cad la rab tu 'jug cing /
translated: Those [bodhisattvas] engage in all the meanings of the victors.

original: rab tu phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed kyi rgyal ba'i don thams cad la gsal bar 'jug pas rgyal ba'i don rnams rab tu phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed de /
analyzed: rab tu phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed kyi rgyal ba'i don thams cad la gsal bar 'jug pas rgyal ba'i don rnams rab tu phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed de /
translated: Since you clearly engage in all the topics of the Victorious Ones equal to the number of atoms, you are the one who has the topics of the Victorious Ones equal to the number of atoms.

original: de rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul par mdzod cig ces sbyar te /🔽rdul phran gyi grangs snyed du yongs su sprul pa'i sku'i tshogs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab cing so sor zhugs pa gang yin pa des gsal zhing mngon sum du rdul phran gyi grangs snyed kyis gang du rnam par rol pa de la de skad
analyzed: de rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul par mdzod cig ces sbyar te / rdul phran gyi grangs snyed du yongs su sprul pa'i sku'i tshogs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab cing so sor zhugs pa gang yin pa des gsal zhing mngon sum du rdul phran gyi grangs snyed kyis gang du rnam par rol pa de la de skad
translated: You are the one who has the emanations equal to the number of atoms.🔽The assembly of emanation bodies that emanate equal to the number of atoms pervades and enters into all world systems.

original: ces bya ste /
analyzed: ces bya ste /
translated: Since that clearly and directly manifests in the display equal to the number of atoms, it is called that.

original: byed pa'i tshig med par bstan pa yin no //
